original: de la snying rje chen po skyes par gyur to //
analyzed: de la snying rje chen po skyes par gyur to //
translated: And he felt great compassion for him.🔽He was adorned with the ornaments of the excellent banner,

analyzed: de nyid rgyal mtshan bzang po'i rgyan rnams dang // phub dang mtshon cha mang pos rnam par mdzes //
translated: And was beautified by many armors and weapons.🔽With an army of horses, elephants, chariots, and infantry,

original: rta dang glang chen shing rta rkang thang dang // sil snyan sna tshogs sgra sgrogs dpung dag gis //
analyzed: rta dang glang chen shing rta rkang thang dang // sil snyan sna tshogs sgra sgrogs dpung dag gis //
translated: And the sound of various musical instruments,

original: phyi bzhin bskyal zhing mdzes pa'i gdugs kyis bskyabs //
analyzed: phyi bzhin bskyal zhing mdzes pa'i gdugs kyis bskyabs //

original: g-yag rnga'i bsil g-yab g-yob pas mdzes par byas //
analyzed: g-yag rnga'i bsil g-yab g-yob pas mdzes par byas //
translated: He was beautified by the waving of yak-tail whisks.

original: skye bo mang pos lha yi dbang po bzhin //
analyzed: skye bo mang pos lha yi dbang po bzhin //
translated: Like the lord of the gods,

original: mchod pa'i rgyal srid bde ba myong gyur nas //
analyzed: mchod pa'i rgyal srid bde ba myong gyur nas //
translated: Having experienced the happiness of the kingdom of offerings,

original: de ring kho nar g-yang sa chen por lhung //
analyzed: de ring kho nar g-yang sa chen por lhung //
translated: Today he fell into a great abyss.

original: lhung ba'i shugs kyis yan lag grugs par gyur //
analyzed: lhung ba'i shugs kyis yan lag grugs par gyur //

original: rgyal bar gyur tam yang na mya ngan byed //
analyzed: rgyal bar gyur tam yang na mya ngan byed //
translated: Either he has become victorious or he is grieving.

original: kye ma'o mtshar byas nyon mongs rang bzhin gyur //
analyzed: kye ma'o mtshar byas nyon mongs rang bzhin gyur //
translated: Alas! The nature of being afflicted by wonders,

original: sdug bsngal ma myong rab tu gzhon sha can //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ma myong rab tu gzhon sha can //
translated: Not having experienced suffering, he is very young and tender.

original: ya rabs rnams la nyams nyes gnod pa bzhin //
analyzed: ya rabs rnams la nyams nyes gnod pa bzhin //

original: ma rabs rnams la rma rnying sos 'dra bar //
analyzed: ma rabs rnams la rma rnying sos 'dra bar //
translated: For the ignoble, it is like a fresh wound on an old sore.

original: sdug bsngal rnams kyis de la gnod mi 'gyur //
analyzed: sdug bsngal rnams kyis de la gnod mi 'gyur //
translated: So suffering does not afflict him.

original: de bas na 'di nas bdag rang thar bar ni mi nus te /
analyzed: de bas na 'di nas bdag rang thar bar ni mi nus te /
translated: Therefore, I cannot free myself from here.

original: srog gi lhag ma tsam cig lus su zin kyang 'di yal bar 'dor bar mi rigs so snyam nas /
analyzed: srog gi lhag ma tsam cig lus su zin kyang 'di yal bar 'dor bar mi rigs so snyam nas /
translated: Even if only a remnant of my life remains, it is not right to abandon it.

original: bdag nyid chen po de snying rjes sems drangs nas g-yang sa'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / de de na 'thab ber ni rdul gyis g-yogs /
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po de snying rjes sems drangs nas g-yang sa'i 'gram du phyin pa dang / de de na 'thab ber ni rdul gyis g-yogs /
translated: Thus, moved by compassion, the great man went to the edge of the cliff, and there he saw the king, his body covered with dust,

original: thod bcings pa ni zhig / g-yang sar @93b lhung ste snad pa'i tshor ba myong bas ni sems la khyab par gyur te /🔽'gre zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo //🔽grog rong de yi nang na 'gre zhing 'dug pa yi //
analyzed: thod bcings pa ni zhig / g-yang sar @93b lhung ste snad pa'i tshor ba myong bas ni sems la khyab par gyur te / 'gre zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo // grog rong de yi nang na 'gre zhing 'dug pa yi //
translated: his turban in disarray, his mind overwhelmed by the pain of falling into the abyss, and he was rolling around.🔽Seeing the king rolling around in the ravine,

original: rgyal po mthong nas mig ni mchims gang //
analyzed: rgyal po mthong nas mig ni mchims gang //
translated: his eyes filled with tears.

original: snying rje'i dbang gis dgra yi 'du shes brjed //
analyzed: snying rje'i dbang gis dgra yi 'du shes brjed //
translated: Overcome by compassion, he forgot his enemy's identity.

original: de yi sdug bsngal thun mong nyid du gyur ;
analyzed: de yi sdug bsngal thun mong nyid du gyur ;
translated: “ ‘Your suffering is shared by me.

original: / skye bo dge ba'i rang bzhin ston byed cing /
analyzed: / skye bo dge ba'i rang bzhin ston byed cing /
translated: I am a person of good nature, and I show you.

original: dbugs 'byin 'gyur ba 'jam zhing gsal ba'i tshig / zhe sar bcas shing yid du 'ong ba yis //
analyzed: dbugs 'byin 'gyur ba 'jam zhing gsal ba'i tshig / zhe sar bcas shing yid du 'ong ba yis //
translated: With words that are gentle, clear, and polite,

original: ya rab sa tshul bzhin de la 'di skad smras //
analyzed: ya rab sa tshul bzhin de la 'di skad smras //
translated: I speak to you in a way that is appropriate.

original: rgyal po chen po snad par ma gyur tam //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po snad par ma gyur tam //
translated: “ ‘Great king, are you not injured?

original: g-yang sa zab mo 'dir ni lhung ba yis ;
analyzed: g-yang sa zab mo 'dir ni lhung ba yis ;
translated: By falling into this deep abyss,

original: / lus la chag grugs byung bar ma gyur tam //
analyzed: / lus la chag grugs byung bar ma gyur tam //
translated: have you not been hurt or wounded?

original: khyod kyi nad rnams rgyas par ma gyur tam //
analyzed: khyod kyi nad rnams rgyas par ma gyur tam //
translated: Have your illnesses not increased?

original: mi yi bdag po bdag ni gzhan ma lags //
analyzed: mi yi bdag po bdag ni gzhan ma lags //
translated: “ ‘Lord of men, I am not a stranger.

original: khyod kyi yul na gnas pa'i ri dvags lags //
analyzed: khyod kyi yul na gnas pa'i ri dvags lags //
translated: I am a deer who lives in your land.

original: khyod kyi rtsva dang chu yis bdag skyed bskyed //
analyzed: khyod kyi rtsva dang chu yis bdag skyed bskyed //
translated: I have been nourished by your grass and water.

original: de bas bdag la bag ni phab par rigs ;
analyzed: de bas bdag la bag ni phab par rigs ;
translated: Therefore, it is fitting that you have confidence in me.

original: / g-yang sar lhung bas mi dgyes ma mdzad cig / khyod ni 'di nas bdag gis dbyung bar nus //
analyzed: / g-yang sar lhung bas mi dgyes ma mdzad cig / khyod ni 'di nas bdag gis dbyung bar nus //
translated: Do not be upset by falling into this abyss. I am able to pull you out from here.

original: bdag la thugs rjes rung bar dgongs nas su //
analyzed: bdag la thugs rjes rung bar dgongs nas su //
translated: Please consider me with compassion.

original: 'o na bdag mchis myur du bka' stsol mdzod //
analyzed: 'o na bdag mchis myur du bka' stsol mdzod //
translated: So please tell me quickly, who are you?

original: de nas rgyal po des de skad smra ba rab tu ngo mtshar che bar gyur pa des ya mtshan du gyur zhing sems mgu yang ngo tsha skyes te bden nam rdzun snyam nas bsams pa /
analyzed: de nas rgyal po des de skad smra ba rab tu ngo mtshar che bar gyur pa des ya mtshan du gyur zhing sems mgu yang ngo tsha skyes te bden nam rdzun snyam nas bsams pa /
translated: Then the king, astonished by the words of the one who was so wondrous, became curious. Although his mind was pleased, he was ashamed. Thinking, Is this true or false?, he thought:

original: dgra la rgol bar nus bzhin du //
analyzed: dgra la rgol bar nus bzhin du //
translated: Although I am able to fight my enemies,

original: bdag la ji ltar snying rje skyes //
analyzed: bdag la ji ltar snying rje skyes //
translated: how can I have compassion for myself?

original: bdag gis gnod par byas pa'ang shes //
analyzed: bdag gis gnod par byas pa'ang shes //
translated: I know that I have done harm.

original: skyon med 'di ni su zhig yin //
analyzed: skyon med 'di ni su zhig yin //
translated: Who is this faultless one?

original: ae ma ho 'jam zhing rno ba yi //
analyzed: ae ma ho 'jam zhing rno ba yi //
translated: Oh! I am urged by the gentle and sharp

original: las kyis bdag ni bskul bar gyur //
analyzed: las kyis bdag ni bskul bar gyur //
translated: actions of this one.

original: bdag nyid phyugs sam ri dvags yin //
analyzed: bdag nyid phyugs sam ri dvags yin //
translated: Am I an animal or a wild animal?

original: ri dvags gzugs can 'di ni gzhan //
analyzed: ri dvags gzugs can 'di ni gzhan //
translated: This one with the form of a wild animal is different.

original: de bas na 'dis bag phab ste smras pa 'di bzhin du bya bar rigs so snyam nas de la smras pa /
analyzed: de bas na 'dis bag phab ste smras pa 'di bzhin du bya bar rigs so snyam nas de la smras pa /
translated: Therefore, it is right to relax and do as he says. Thinking this, he said to him:

original: 'thab ber mthug po bgos pas na //
analyzed: 'thab ber mthug po bgos pas na //
translated: Because I was wearing thick armor,

original: bdag gi lus 'di cher ma snad //
analyzed: bdag gi lus 'di cher ma snad //
translated: my body was not greatly injured.

original: g-yang sa na ni lhung ba yis //
analyzed: g-yang sa na ni lhung ba yis //
translated: By falling into the abyss,

original: cung zad snad pa bdag gis bzod //
analyzed: cung zad snad pa bdag gis bzod //
translated: I can bear a little injury.

original: khyod ltar dge bar sems pa la //🔽nongs pa bgyis pa'i sdug bsngal tsam //
analyzed: khyod ltar dge bar sems pa la // nongs pa bgyis pa'i sdug bsngal tsam //
translated: But for one who thinks as you do, virtuous,🔽the pain of having done wrong

original: g-yang sa na ni lhung ba yi //
analyzed: g-yang sa na ni lhung ba yi //
translated: is like the pain of falling into an abyss.

original: sdug bsngal bdag la ga la mchis //
analyzed: sdug bsngal bdag la ga la mchis //
translated: How could I have such pain?

original: gzugs kyi rkyen gyis ri dvags ltar //🔽bdag gis khyod @94a * //
analyzed: gzugs kyi rkyen gyis ri dvags ltar // bdag gis khyod @94a * //
translated: By the condition of form, like a deer,

original: ni mthong bar gyur //
analyzed: ni mthong bar gyur //
translated: I saw you.

original: khyod kyi rang bzhin ma 'tshal ba //
analyzed: khyod kyi rang bzhin ma 'tshal ba //
translated: Not knowing your nature,🔽I have offended you.🔽Please forgive me.

original: de ni thugs lam bcangs shig / de nas rgyal po de yi tshig / dga' bar ston pa smras pa des //
analyzed: de ni thugs lam bcangs shig / de nas rgyal po de yi tshig / dga' bar ston pa smras pa des //
translated: Then, the king,

original: grog rong nas dbyung bar 'dod pa sha ra bhas rig nas /
analyzed: grog rong nas dbyung bar 'dod pa sha ra bhas rig nas /
translated: having heard those words of Śarabhaṅga, who wanted to pull him out of the ravine,

original: rdo ba mi'i ljid tsam du ljib gcig la tshad de dbyung nus par goms par byas nas /
analyzed: rdo ba mi'i ljid tsam du ljib gcig la tshad de dbyung nus par goms par byas nas /
translated: practiced lifting a stone that weighed as much as a man, and became able to pull him out.

original: bdag gi stobs kyi nyams drod rig pa dang / rgyal po de dbyung bar chas te /
analyzed: bdag gi stobs kyi nyams drod rig pa dang / rgyal po de dbyung bar chas te /
translated: When he knew the extent of his strength, and the king was ready to be pulled out,🔽he entered the ravine and came before him.

original: grog rong de'i nang du zhugs nas de'i drung du 'ongs nas gus par smras pa /
analyzed: grog rong de'i nang du zhugs nas de'i drung du 'ongs nas gus par smras pa /
translated: He spoke respectfully:

original: bdag la phan par gyur par gzigs nas su //
analyzed: bdag la phan par gyur par gzigs nas su //
translated: “Seeing that it would be beneficial for me,

original: dgyes shing dang ba'i zhal gyis mngon phyogs pa ;
analyzed: dgyes shing dang ba'i zhal gyis mngon phyogs pa ;
translated: With a face that is joyful and full of faith,🔽

original: / de yi bar du bdag lus reg pa 'di //
analyzed: / de yi bar du bdag lus reg pa 'di //
translated: He turned his face toward her, with a countenance full of joy and confidence, and said: This body of mine, which you touch,

original: dgos pa'i dbang gis re zhig bzod par mdzod //
analyzed: dgos pa'i dbang gis re zhig bzod par mdzod //
translated: is for the moment yours, as it is the price of my safety.

original: rgyal po chen po de bas na bdag gi rgyab tu bcibs la bdag la legs par 'jus shig ces smras pa dang / des kyang de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes mnyan nas rta la zhon pa bzhin du de la zhon no //
analyzed: rgyal po chen po de bas na bdag gi rgyab tu bcibs la bdag la legs par 'jus shig ces smras pa dang / des kyang de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes mnyan nas rta la zhon pa bzhin du de la zhon no //
translated: Therefore, O great king, mount on my back and hold fast to me. The king consented, saying: So be it, and mounted him as if he were a horse.

original: de nas ro stod gyen du mngon bstod nas //
analyzed: de nas ro stod gyen du mngon bstod nas //
translated: Then, raising his upper body,🔽the king mounted him well,

original: mi yi bdag pos legs par zhon pa dang // snying stobs chen po drag po'i shugs kyis mchongs //
analyzed: mi yi bdag pos legs par zhon pa dang // snying stobs chen po drag po'i shugs kyis mchongs //
translated: and the Great Being, with the force of a violent spring,

original: rta babs rgyan bzhin steng du byung bar gyur //
analyzed: rta babs rgyan bzhin steng du byung bar gyur //
translated: rose up like a flying horse.

original: de nas rgyal po grog rong nas phyung ba dang / dga' bar gyur nas rta yang blangs te byin //
analyzed: de nas rgyal po grog rong nas phyung ba dang / dga' bar gyur nas rta yang blangs te byin //
translated: Then, when the king was out of the ravine, he was delighted, and took the horse and gave it to him.

original: rang gi khyim du 'gro ba'i lam bstan nas //
analyzed: rang gi khyim du 'gro ba'i lam bstan nas //
translated: He showed him the way to his own house,

original: nags tshal nang du 'gro bar chas par gyur //
analyzed: nags tshal nang du 'gro bar chas par gyur //
translated: and he set out to go into the forest.

original: de nas rgyal po de byas pa drin du gzo bas /
analyzed: de nas rgyal po de byas pa drin du gzo bas /
translated: Then the king, in gratitude for what had been done for him,

original: de'i phan btags pa'i dul zhing 'jam pa des sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas /
analyzed: de'i phan btags pa'i dul zhing 'jam pa des sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas /
translated: with that gentleness and courtesy which had been so helpful to him, his mind filled with joy,

original: sha ra bha la mgul nas 'khyud de smras pa /
analyzed: sha ra bha la mgul nas 'khyud de smras pa /
translated: embraced Sharabha around the neck and said:

original: bdag gi srog kyang ri dvags khyod mnga' na //
analyzed: bdag gi srog kyang ri dvags khyod mnga' na //
translated: “Even my life is yours, O deer,

original: bdag la bzlog pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos //
analyzed: bdag la bzlog pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos //
translated: how much more so anything else that might be returned to me!

original: des na bdag gi khyim 'di gzigs par rigs //
analyzed: des na bdag gi khyim 'di gzigs par rigs //
translated: Therefore it is fitting that you should see my house.

original: bzhugs su gnang na de na bzhugs su gsol //
analyzed: bzhugs su gnang na de na bzhugs su gsol //
translated: If you will consent to stay, then please stay there.

original: nags tshal rngon pa gang zhig 'jigs dang bcas //
analyzed: nags tshal rngon pa gang zhig 'jigs dang bcas //
translated: The hunter in the forest is fearful,

original: grang dang tsha dang char 'bab sdug bsngal can //🔽'di lta bur ni bdag gis khyod bor nas //
analyzed: grang dang tsha dang char 'bab sdug bsngal can // 'di lta bur ni bdag gis khyod bor nas //
translated: cold, hot, and suffering from the rain.

original: bdag ni gcig pur khyim du 'gro mi rigs //
analyzed: bdag ni gcig pur khyim du 'gro mi rigs //
translated: It is not right for me to go home alone,🔽abandoning you in this way.🔽Therefore let us go together. Come!”

original: de bas na 'o skol 'grogs te bzhud kyis tshur spyon zhes smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dul zhing 'jam pa'i tshig gis mgu bar byas nas de la slar smras pa /
analyzed: de bas na 'o skol 'grogs te bzhud kyis tshur spyon zhes smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'dul zhing 'jam pa'i tshig gis mgu bar byas nas de la slar smras pa /
translated: Then the Bodhisattva, with gentle and courteous words, pleased him and replied:

original: mi mchog yon tan @94b dga' ba khyod lta bu //
analyzed: mi mchog yon tan @94b dga' ba khyod lta bu //
translated: For you, who delight in the virtues of the best of men,

original: nyid la tshul 'di rab tu rigs pa lags //
analyzed: nyid la tshul 'di rab tu rigs pa lags //
translated: this way of life is most appropriate.

original: goms par byas pas skye bo dam pa rnams //
analyzed: goms par byas pas skye bo dam pa rnams //
translated: By training, the best of people

original: yon tan mang po rang gi ngang du gyur //
analyzed: yon tan mang po rang gi ngang du gyur //
translated: become naturally endowed with many virtues.

original: gal te bdag la phan btags bzhed na ni //
analyzed: gal te bdag la phan btags bzhed na ni //
translated: If you wish to help me,

original: bdag cag khyim na mi gnas nags na goms //
analyzed: bdag cag khyim na mi gnas nags na goms //
translated: I will not stay at home, but will go to the forest.

original: de bas mi rnams bde ba'ang gzhan khyim lags //
analyzed: de bas mi rnams bde ba'ang gzhan khyim lags //
translated: Therefore, the happiness of men is one thing,

original: ri dags rigs dang mthun pa'i bde pa'ang gzhan //
analyzed: ri dags rigs dang mthun pa'i bde pa'ang gzhan //
translated: the happiness of the deer is another.

original: gal te bdag ni dga' bar khyod bzhed na //
analyzed: gal te bdag ni dga' bar khyod bzhed na //
translated: If you wish to please me,

original: dpa' bo khyod kyis rngon pa'i phrin las spangs //
analyzed: dpa' bo khyod kyis rngon pa'i phrin las spangs //
translated: you, a hero, must give up the work of a hunter.

original: dud 'gro'i rang bzhin sems ni glan pa can //
analyzed: dud 'gro'i rang bzhin sems ni glan pa can //
translated: The minds of animals are naturally unruly;

original: ri dags nyon mongs rnams la snying rje mdzod //🔽bde la gnas dang sdug bsngal bral 'dod pa //
analyzed: ri dags nyon mongs rnams la snying rje mdzod // bde la gnas dang sdug bsngal bral 'dod pa //
translated: have compassion for the deer, who are tormented by desire.🔽Think of all beings as equal,

original: sems can thams cad mtshungs par thugs la dgongs //🔽de bas bdag nyid mi 'dod gang yin pa //
analyzed: sems can thams cad mtshungs par thugs la dgongs // de bas bdag nyid mi 'dod gang yin pa //
translated: desiring happiness and wanting to be free from suffering.🔽Therefore, it is not right to do to others

original: de dag gzhan la bgyi bar mi rigs so //
analyzed: de dag gzhan la bgyi bar mi rigs so //
translated: what you do not want for yourself.

original: grags pa med cing dam pas smad par 'gyur //
analyzed: grags pa med cing dam pas smad par 'gyur //
translated: You will be without fame and will be despised by the holy.

original: sdug bsngal sdig las byung bar rig nas ni //
analyzed: sdug bsngal sdig las byung bar rig nas ni //
translated: Knowing that suffering arises from evil,

original: dgra bo'i phyogs bzhin sdig pa spong bar mdzod //
analyzed: dgra bo'i phyogs bzhin sdig pa spong bar mdzod //
translated: Abandon evil as you would the side of an enemy.

original: de ni rang bzhin yal bar dor mi rigs //
analyzed: de ni rang bzhin yal bar dor mi rigs //
translated: It is not right to abandon it to its own devices.

original: gang la brten nas dpal gyi gnas gyur pa //
analyzed: gang la brten nas dpal gyi gnas gyur pa //
translated: The source of the glory of the king

original: 'jig rten bsngags pa'i rgyal srid thob 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: 'jig rten bsngags pa'i rgyal srid thob 'gyur ba'i //
translated: Is the attainment of the kingdom praised by the world.

original: bsod nams de nyid rnam par 'phel bar mdzod //
analyzed: bsod nams de nyid rnam par 'phel bar mdzod //
translated: Increase that very merit.

original: phan 'dogs phyogs ni spong bar yong mi rigs //
analyzed: phan 'dogs phyogs ni spong bar yong mi rigs //
translated: It is not right to abandon the side that benefits.🔽Generosity is the timely service with vast gifts,🔽Steadfast discipline is the virtue that accords with the people,

original: dus su rim gro byas pa'i sbyin pa rgya chen dang // skye bo dge dang mthun pa'i tshul khrims brtan pa dang // bdag dang gzhan la phan pa bsgrub pa'i blos //
analyzed: dus su rim gro byas pa'i sbyin pa rgya chen dang // skye bo dge dang mthun pa'i tshul khrims brtan pa dang // bdag dang gzhan la phan pa bsgrub pa'i blos //
translated: And the wisdom that accomplishes benefit for self and other

original: bde ba bsgrub dang grags dang bsod nams sogs //
analyzed: bde ba bsgrub dang grags dang bsod nams sogs //
translated: Is the supreme cause of the attainment of happiness, fame, merit, and so forth.

original: de ltar bdag nyid chen po des rgyal po de la tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don du bya ba la phan ni btags /
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid chen po des rgyal po de la tshe 'di dang tshe phyi ma'i don du bya ba la phan ni btags /
translated: In this way, the great being benefited the king in this life and in the next life.

original: rgyal po des kyang dgos pa'i tshig mnyan te rab tu gus pas lta bzhin du nags tshal de nyid kyi nang du bzhud de song ngo //
analyzed: rgyal po des kyang dgos pa'i tshig mnyan te rab tu gus pas lta bzhin du nags tshal de nyid kyi nang du bzhud de song ngo //
translated: The king listened to his words and, looking at him with respect, went into the forest.

original: de lta bas na snying rje chen po rnams ni bdag la gnod par byed pa rnams kyang nyams nyes par gyur na snying brtse bar byed kyi yal bar mi dor ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na snying rje chen po rnams ni bdag la gnod par byed pa rnams kyang nyams nyes par gyur na snying brtse bar byed kyi yal bar mi dor ro //
translated: Thus, the great compassionate ones feel compassion for those who harm them, and do not abandon them.

original: de bzhin du snying rje chen po'i yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du snying rje chen po'i yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The praise of the qualities of great compassion should be stated in the same way.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa dang / rim gro bskyed de dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang / 'khon med par byas na dgra zhi bar 'gyur ba'i dpe dang / @95a * //
translated: The praise of the qualities of the Tathāgata, the respectful listening to the holy Dharma, and the example of how enemies are pacified when there is no hostility

analyzed: bzod pa'i gtam bya ba la yang sbyar bar bya ste /

analyzed: mir gyur pa'am rab tu byung bar khas 'ches pa la sems can rnams la snying rje med na ltag la rung zhes srog chags rnams la snying rje dang ldan par bya zhes kyang brjod par bya'o //
translated: If you are a human being or one who has taken up the religious life, you should have compassion for living beings.

analyzed: ri dvags sha ra bhar skyes pa'i rabs te nyi shu lnga pa'o /

translated: There were many small trees entwined with various vines.🔽There were many animals such as ruru deer, prishta deer, srimaras, gayal, elephants, bamboos, buffalo, antelopes, nakulas, wild boars, tigers,

analyzed: gzig dang / seng ge dang / spyang ki dang / dom dang / dred la sogs pa mang po rgyu ba /

original: mi'i rgyun lugs med pa'i sa phyogs cig na /
analyzed: mi'i rgyun lugs med pa'i sa phyogs cig na /
translated: In a place where there were no human settlements,

analyzed: ri dvags ru ru gser btso ma'i kha dog gsal ba 'dra ba /

original: spu rab tu 'jam pa /
analyzed: spu rab tu 'jam pa /

analyzed: lus kyi mdog rin po che aan da rnyil dang / mar gad dang / bee d'urya'i kha dog 'dra ba'i tshon sna tshogs kyi thig les brgyan pa /

analyzed: mig gi dkyus ni ring zhing bkrag bzang ba /

analyzed: rva dang rmig pa rin po che ltar 'jam zhing 'od dang ldan pa /

original: gzugs blta na rab tu sdug pa /
analyzed: gzugs blta na rab tu sdug pa /

original: rin po che'i 'byung gnas 'gro shes pa 'dra ba cig tu gyur to zhes grags so //
analyzed: rin po che'i 'byung gnas 'gro shes pa 'dra ba cig tu gyur to zhes grags so //

analyzed: de yang rang gi lus chags su rung ba dang skye bo rnams snying rje chung bar shes nas /

analyzed: nags tshal @95b stug po skye bo med pa dag na nyams dga' bar 'dug go //
translated: So he lived in thick forests that were free of people and delightful.

analyzed: de sems rno bas phyogs gang dang gang na rngon pa rnams rgyu ba dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / gtor dang / rgya mo dang / rnyi bcugs pa dang / rnyong dang / shing gi wa dang 'dzol rnams legs par spangs nas ri dvags mang po rjes su 'brang ba rnams la yang slob dpon dang pha ma bzhin du slob pa dang /
translated: Because of his sharp mind, he avoided all the places where hunters roamed, and where there were traps, snares, nets, and pits, and where there were wooden decoys and effigies. He was a teacher and a father to the many animals that followed him.

original: ri dvags rnams kyi bdag po byed cing 'dug go //
analyzed: ri dvags rnams kyi bdag po byed cing 'dug go //

original: gzugs dang shes pa phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: gzugs dang shes pa phun sum tshogs //

original: bya ba rnams la mkhas pas brgyan //
analyzed: bya ba rnams la mkhas pas brgyan //
translated: He was adorned with skill in all activities.

original: bdag la phan 'dod skye bo la //
analyzed: bdag la phan 'dod skye bo la //
translated: What person who wishes to benefit himself

original: mchod pa mi byed su zhig yod ;
analyzed: mchod pa mi byed su zhig yod ;
translated: would not make offerings to him?

original: / de nas re zhig cig bdag nyid chen po de nags tshal stug po de na gnas bcas shing 'dug 'dug pa las /
analyzed: / de nas re zhig cig bdag nyid chen po de nags tshal stug po de na gnas bcas shing 'dug 'dug pa las /
translated: Then, one day, the great being, who was living in that dense forest,

analyzed: de dang nye ba cig na 'bab pa'i chu gsar du bab pas gang ba rab tu shugs drag pos mi zhig khyer nas ngu zhing 'bod pa'i sgra thos par gyur to //

original: chu chen 'brub pa rab tu drag po yis //
analyzed: chu chen 'brub pa rab tu drag po yis //
translated: The river was rushing on with a mighty roar,

original: khyer nas mgon med gzings kyang yod ma yin //
analyzed: khyer nas mgon med gzings kyang yod ma yin //

original: bdag ltar phongs shing nyam thag bsgral ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag ltar phongs shing nyam thag bsgral ba'i phyir //

original: sdug bsngal byams pas myur du brgyugs te bzung //
analyzed: sdug bsngal byams pas myur du brgyugs te bzung //

analyzed: da ni shol du rung ba ma yin te // ngal zhing dub pas dpung pa'ang 'gyur mi nus //

analyzed: zug cing 'bog tu rung ba'ang cung zad med //

original: de bas brgyugs te 'ong ba'i dus la bab //
analyzed: de bas brgyugs te 'ong ba'i dus la bab //

analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' des snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing 'bod pa'i sgra des snying la brdeg pa bzhin du gyur nas /

translated: He said, Do not fear, do not fear! and with a voice that was not at all fearful, unpleasant, or tired, he spoke in the human language, having been accustomed to it for a hundred years.

analyzed: nags tshal stug po de nas byung ba dang thag ring po nas mi de chus khyer ba yid du 'ong ba'i skyes bskur te btang ba bzhin du 'ong ba mthong ngo //

original: de nas de bsgral phyir ni ngas byas pas //
analyzed: de nas de bsgral phyir ni ngas byas pas //

original: bdag srog yal bar bor yang mi sems par //
analyzed: bdag srog yal bar bor yang mi sems par //

original: de ni 'bab chu drag po'i 'jing der bzhugs //
analyzed: de ni 'bab chu drag po'i 'jing der bzhugs //

original: dgra yi dpung rnams 'joms pa'i dpa' bo bzhin //
analyzed: dgra yi dpung rnams 'joms pa'i dpa' bo bzhin //
translated: Like a hero who conquers an army of enemies,

original: de nas lus kyis de yi lam bkag nas //
analyzed: de nas lus kyis de yi lam bkag nas //

analyzed: nga la 'jus zhes de la tshig tu smras // skrag @96a * //

analyzed: pas nyan la ngal bas yan lag 'khums //

original: de ni de yi rgyab tu zhon par gyur //
analyzed: de ni de yi rgyab tu zhon par gyur //

original: mi de'i ljid kyis rab tu non gyur zhing //

analyzed: 'bab chu drag po'i shugs kyis bdas gyur kyang //

original: dpa' snying brtan la rtsol ba drag po yis //

analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i 'gram du ma nyams phyin //

original: de nas mi de 'gram du phyin par byas nas su //
analyzed: de nas mi de 'gram du phyin par byas nas su //

analyzed: rab tu dga' bas ngal ba'i sdug bsngal med par gyur //

original: lam yang bstan nas de la song zhes smras pas btang //
analyzed: lam yang bstan nas de la song zhes smras pas btang //

analyzed: de nas mi de des grogs byas shing phan btags pa de lta bu nye du dang grogs po mdza' ba su la yang med par rab tu ngo mtshar che ba des sems ni rab tu mgu bar gyur /

analyzed: de'i gzugs bzang po des kyang ya mtshan dang zhes bskyed nas phyag 'tshal te /

analyzed: de la tshig snyan pa de dang de dag smras pa /

analyzed: khyod kyis bdag la bgyis pa ni // gnyen bshes byis pa tshun chad nas //
translated: What you have done for me🔽is something that even my own children,

analyzed: byams par gyur pa bdag gis kyang //

original: 'di lta bu dag byar mi nus //
analyzed: 'di lta bu dag byar mi nus //

analyzed: bdag gi srog 'di khyod kyi lags // khyod kyi don du cung zad tsam //
translated: My life is in your hands.🔽For your sake, I have used

analyzed: dgos pa cig tu spyad nas su //

analyzed: bdag la rab tu bka' drin che //

original: de bas ci bgyi bka' stsal bas //
analyzed: de bas ci bgyi bka' stsal bas //

analyzed: bdag la rjes su bzung bar rigs //

analyzed: khyod la gang du ci 'tshal ba //

original: de ni bdag nyid bskyed du gsol //
analyzed: de ni bdag nyid bskyed du gsol //
translated: please command me to do it.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpas de la gus par smras pa /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpas de la gus par smras pa /
translated: Then the bodhisattva respectfully said to him:

original: skye bo dam pa drin gzo rmad mi che //
analyzed: skye bo dam pa drin gzo rmad mi che //
translated: “It is not surprising that a good person should repay kindness,

analyzed: de yi chos nyid rang bzhin grub pa yin // 'gro ba rnams ni 'gyur ba mang du mthong //

analyzed: byas pa drin du gzo ba deng song yon tan che //

analyzed: de bas na khyod la gdams pa ni phan btags pa rjes su dran par bya ba na /

analyzed: mi rnams kyi snying yang 'dod pa che la bag med pa mang ste /

analyzed: de bas na bdag gi yon tan dang / nga yang legs par bsrung bar rigs // mdza' bo dag la snying ring ba //

original: gang na'ang bde ba yod ma yin //
analyzed: gang na'ang bde ba yod ma yin //

analyzed: snying mi dga' bar ma sems shig / gzhan yang / log pa'i chos la mkhas pa yis //

analyzed: de lta'i g-yo dag byas pa'i phyir // rang bzhin gyis ni dul ba yi//

analyzed: de yang rmi lam ngo mtshar che ba gang dang gang mthong ba de dang de dag de bzhin du 'gyur ro //

analyzed: dpal rab tu 'bar ba seng ge'i khri steng na 'dug cing /

analyzed: rgyal po dang bcas pa'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te tshig gsal zhing sdeb legs pas chos 'chad pa mthong ngo //

analyzed: de nas sems de las ngo mtshar cher bzung ba las /

analyzed: bdag rang gi ming rus nas su yang mi 'bod par bzod par smra ba zhes 'jig rten pa rnams kyis yang dag par blo bskyed de ming du grags so //

original: dbang phyug rigs pa dka' thub phun sum tshogs //
analyzed: dbang phyug rigs pa dka' thub phun sum tshogs //

original: sgyu rtsal rnams la goms pa rgya che ba //
analyzed: sgyu rtsal rnams la goms pa rgya che ba //
translated: He was skilled in the arts, and he was very learned.

original: lus dang ngag gi spyod pa mthu rtsal can //
analyzed: lus dang ngag gi spyod pa mthu rtsal can //
translated: He was strong, with a body and speech that were powerful.

original: mi rnams ming ni gzhan du 'dogs par byed //
analyzed: mi rnams ming ni gzhan du 'dogs par byed //
translated: People gave him the name “Patient Speech.”

original: de ni bzod pa'i yon tan mthu shes nas ;
analyzed: de ni bzod pa'i yon tan mthu shes nas ;

original: / de yis bdag gzhan 'jig rten rab tu brgyan //
analyzed: / de yis bdag gzhan 'jig rten rab tu brgyan //

original: bzod pa'i gtam yang rgyun du byed par gyur //
analyzed: bzod pa'i gtam yang rgyun du byed par gyur //
translated: He always spoke about patience.

original: de bas de ni bzod par smra zhes grags //
analyzed: de bas de ni bzod par smra zhes grags //

original: bzod pa chen po rang gi ngang du gyur //
analyzed: bzod pa chen po rang gi ngang du gyur //
translated: He had great patience, and he was self-controlled.

original: gzhan la gnod pa mi byed rab tu brtan //
analyzed: gzhan la gnod pa mi byed rab tu brtan //
translated: He was very steady in not harming others.

original: de yi don dang mthun pa'i gtam dag gis //🔽thub @104a * //
analyzed: de yi don dang mthun pa'i gtam dag gis // thub @104a * //
translated: By his discourses in conformity with their aims,

original: pa de yi grags pa rgyas par gyur //
analyzed: pa de yi grags pa rgyas par gyur //
translated: the fame of that Sage spread.

original: de nas bdag nyid chen po de nags tshal gyi phyogs rab tu dben zhing nyams dga' ba /
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid chen po de nags tshal gyi phyogs rab tu dben zhing nyams dga' ba /
translated: Then, in a very secluded and delightful part of the forest,

analyzed: me tog dang 'bras bu dus thams cad du rnyed par sla ba /
translated: where flowers and fruits were always easily obtained,

original: mtsho chu gtsang ma padma dang autpa las brgyan pa /
analyzed: mtsho chu gtsang ma padma dang autpa las brgyan pa /
translated: and where a pure lake was adorned with lotuses and utpalas,

analyzed: skyed mos tshal nyams dga' ba bzhin du mdzes pa zhig tu gnas bcas pas dka' thub kyi nags tshal shin tu bkra shis par byas so // dam pa yon tan mchog ldan pa //
translated: like a delightful pleasure garden, the Great Being made his dwelling. Thus he made the forest of asceticism very auspicious.

original: gang na gnas pa de dag nyid //
analyzed: gang na gnas pa de dag nyid //
translated: Wherever the virtuous, who possess the highest qualities,🔽dwell,🔽there will be auspiciousness, delight,

original: bkra shis yid du 'ong ba dang // ri nyid brten dang dka' thub tshal //
analyzed: bkra shis yid du 'ong ba dang // ri nyid brten dang dka' thub tshal //
translated: mountains, and forests for asceticism.

original: de na gnas pa'i lha rnams ni //
analyzed: de na gnas pa'i lha rnams ni //
translated: The gods who dwell there

original: de la shin tu dad pa skyes //
analyzed: de la shin tu dad pa skyes //
translated: will develop great faith in him.

original: skye bo phan par 'dod cing yon tan la dga' ba rnams ni bkur sti byed cing 'ong bar gyur te /
analyzed: skye bo phan par 'dod cing yon tan la dga' ba rnams ni bkur sti byed cing 'ong bar gyur te /
translated: People who wish to help others and who delight in virtue come to honor him.

original: skye bo mang po de rnams la chos kyi gtam bzod pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: skye bo mang po de rnams la chos kyi gtam bzod pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He benefits those many people with Dharma teachings that are full of patience,

analyzed: rnar 'ong zhing sems la 'bab pa rnams kyis phan btags so //
translated: that are pleasing to the ear, and that are appealing to the mind.

analyzed: de nas re zhig cig yul de'i rgyal po dpyid kyi dus la bab pas /
translated: Then, at one time, the king of that country, when spring had come,

analyzed: chu'i nang du rtser 'gro 'dod par gyur te /
translated: wanted to go to play in the water.

original: skyed mos tshal gyi yon tan pas kyang lhag pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i nags tshal gyi phyogs der btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te song ngo //
analyzed: skyed mos tshal gyi yon tan pas kyang lhag pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i nags tshal gyi phyogs der btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te song ngo //
translated: He went to that forest region, which was a place superior to the pleasure grove, together with his harem.

analyzed: dga' ba'i tshal ltar nyams dga' mdzes pa'i tshal //

analyzed: de yi btsun mo'i 'khor gyis gang bar gyur // longs spyod can gyi spyod tshul mdzes pa yi // na chung chas pa rnams kyis brgyan pa bzhin //

original: 'khri shing 'khyil pas gtibs pa lding khang bzhin //
analyzed: 'khri shing 'khyil pas gtibs pa lding khang bzhin //

original: me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing bkod pa bzhin//
analyzed: me tog rgyas pa'i ljon shing bkod pa bzhin//
translated: Like a tree in full bloom.

original: padma rab tu rgyas pa'i mtsho 'gram na //
analyzed: padma rab tu rgyas pa'i mtsho 'gram na //

analyzed: btsun mo rnams ni rab tu dga' zhing rtse // me tog phreng dang khrus kyi byug spos kyi //

analyzed: bsung zhim ngad kyis bung ba 'dus rnams la //

original: btsun mo kha cig ltad mo cher lta ba //
analyzed: btsun mo kha cig ltad mo cher lta ba //

analyzed: ya mtshan cher gyur bsngags shing 'dzum pas mdzes //

analyzed: me tog rna cha gsar pas rab tu mdzes pa dang // skra yi rgyan du btags pa'i phreng ba mdzes yod kyang //

analyzed: de dag me tog 'dod pas tshim par ma gyur te //

original: de bzhin rgyal po'i btsun mo rtse bas snying ma tshim //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyal po'i btsun mo rtse bas snying ma tshim //
translated: In the same way, the queens of the king were not content with their play.

original: me tog shing la bud med mig lta zhing //
analyzed: me tog shing la bud med mig lta zhing //
translated: Women looked at the flowering trees

original: gzhal med khang la lta bas chags @104b gyur pa //
analyzed: gzhal med khang la lta bas chags @104b gyur pa //

original: padma'i mtshon bung ba dngar ba bzhin //
analyzed: padma'i mtshon bung ba dngar ba bzhin //

original: rab tu mdzes pa rgyal pos mthong bar gyur //
analyzed: rab tu mdzes pa rgyal pos mthong bar gyur //

analyzed: ko ki la dag myos pa'i sgra rnams dang // rma bya gar byed bung ba glu len dang // na chung tshig smra glu len gar byed pas //

original: de dag de na rab tu mdzes par snang //
analyzed: de dag de na rab tu mdzes par snang //

original: 'brug sgra zab mo rnga sgra brdungs pa bzhin //
analyzed: 'brug sgra zab mo rnga sgra brdungs pa bzhin //

original: rma bya mang po lhang lhang sgra 'byin zhing //
analyzed: rma bya mang po lhang lhang sgra 'byin zhing //

original: rab tu sgyu rtsal thabs kyis gar byed pa //
analyzed: rab tu sgyu rtsal thabs kyis gar byed pa //

original: rgyal po de la rma bya gar byed 'dra //
analyzed: rgyal po de la rma bya gar byed 'dra //
translated: The king is like a peacock dancing.

original: de de na btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa nags tshal skyed mos tshal 'dra ba na spyod pa'i bde ba nyams su myong nas rtse rtse bas chad cing 'dod pa la chags pa'i dbang gis shing grib dpal dang ldan pa gzhal med khang pa'i drung du mal cha
analyzed: de de na btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa nags tshal skyed mos tshal 'dra ba na spyod pa'i bde ba nyams su myong nas rtse rtse bas chad cing 'dod pa la chags pa'i dbang gis shing grib dpal dang ldan pa gzhal med khang pa'i drung du mal cha
translated: There, together with his harem, he experiences the pleasures of strolling in a garden-like forest. After playing, due to the power of attachment to desire, he lies down on an excellent bed

original: bzang po bting ba la nyal te gnyid kyis log par gyur to //
analyzed: bzang po bting ba la nyal te gnyid kyis log par gyur to //
translated: spread out in the shade of a glorious tree, in front of a celestial palace, and falls asleep.

original: de nas btsun mo de dag rgyal po mnal ba'i skabs su bab pa shes nas //
analyzed: de nas btsun mo de dag rgyal po mnal ba'i skabs su bab pa shes nas //
translated: Then, knowing that the king was asleep, the queens🔽went to the beautiful forest,

original: nags tshal mdzes pa la snying chags shing de lta bas ma ngoms pas dga' ste dga' ba der chas so //
analyzed: nags tshal mdzes pa la snying chags shing de lta bas ma ngoms pas dga' ste dga' ba der chas so //
translated: their hearts attached to it, not sated with looking at it, delighted, eager to enjoy it.🔽They wandered about,

analyzed: rgyan rnams sil sil zer ba'i sgra dang mdzes pa'i skad snyan pa 'byin cing kun tu 'khyams su song ngo //
translated: their ornaments tinkling, their beautiful voices sweetly singing.

original: de dag gdugs dang rnga yab stan la sogs //
analyzed: de dag gdugs dang rnga yab stan la sogs //
translated: Their parasols, yak-tails, seats,

original: gser gyis brgyan pa rnams ni bran mos thogs //
analyzed: gser gyis brgyan pa rnams ni bran mos thogs //
translated: and golden ornaments were carried by their servants.

original: dbang phyug rtags dang bcas pa rjes su 'brang //
analyzed: dbang phyug rtags dang bcas pa rjes su 'brang //

original: bud med rang bzhin 'phyar ba rnam par rgyu //
analyzed: bud med rang bzhin 'phyar ba rnam par rgyu //

analyzed: de dag ljon shing bzang po'i me tog dang // lo ma sdug gu bsnyab tu slebs pa rnams //

analyzed: bran mos btogs te dbul gyis mi slebs pa //

original: chags pa'i dbang gis bdag cag nyid kyis btogs//
analyzed: chags pa'i dbang gis bdag cag nyid kyis btogs//

original: shing lo g-yo ba'i shing dang gel pa rnams //
analyzed: shing lo g-yo ba'i shing dang gel pa rnams //
translated: The trees and shrubs with moving leaves

original: lam dang nye ba me tog rgyas pa kun //
analyzed: lam dang nye ba me tog rgyas pa kun //
translated: The path and its environs are in full bloom.

original: me tog phreng ba'i rgyan gyis bklubs zin kyang //
analyzed: me tog phreng ba'i rgyan gyis bklubs zin kyang //
translated: They are already adorned with garlands of flowers,

analyzed: chags pa'i dbang gis ma btogs de ma dong //
translated: but because of their attachment they do not pick them, and so do not leave.

original: de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo de dag nags tshal nyams dga' ba de las sems g-yeng bzhin du /
analyzed: de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo de dag nags tshal nyams dga' ba de las sems g-yeng bzhin du /
translated: Then, as the king’s queens were distracted by the delights of the forest,

original: nags tshal de'i nang nas mthar gyis song song ba las /
analyzed: nags tshal de'i nang nas mthar gyis song song ba las /
translated: they gradually went deeper into the forest.

original: bzod par smra ba'i dka' thub kyi nags su phyin to //
analyzed: bzod par smra ba'i dka' thub kyi nags su phyin to //
translated: They arrived at the forest hermitage of Kṣāntivāda.

original: bud med bsrung ba'i nyug rum pa rnams kyis /
analyzed: bud med bsrung ba'i nyug rum pa rnams kyis /
translated: The guards who were protecting the women

original: thub pa de'i dka' thub kyi mthu che bar shes shing /
analyzed: thub pa de'i dka' thub kyi mthu che bar shes shing /
translated: knew of the great power of the sage’s austerities.

original: btsun mo de rnams kyang rgyal po'i gnang chen yin la bcos dka' ba'i @105a * //
analyzed: btsun mo de rnams kyang rgyal po'i gnang chen yin la bcos dka' ba'i @105a * //
translated: The queens were also the king’s favorites and difficult to correct,

original: phyir der mi 'dod bar bzlog ma nus so //
analyzed: phyir der mi 'dod bar bzlog ma nus so //
translated: so they were unable to stop them from going there against their will.

original: dka' thub kyi nags de byi dor legs par byas pas nyams dga' zhing yid du 'ong bas /
analyzed: dka' thub kyi nags de byi dor legs par byas pas nyams dga' zhing yid du 'ong bas /
translated: The forest hermitage was well maintained, delightful, and pleasing.

original: btsun mo de dag drangs pa bzhin du der lhags pa dang / de na thub pa'i mchog de rab tu zhi zhing dul bar snang yang rab tu zab pas dka' thub kyi dpal me 'bar ba bzhin du bsnyen par ni dka'/
analyzed: btsun mo de dag drangs pa bzhin du der lhags pa dang / de na thub pa'i mchog de rab tu zhi zhing dul bar snang yang rab tu zab pas dka' thub kyi dpal me 'bar ba bzhin du bsnyen par ni dka'/
translated: although that supreme sage appeared to be very peaceful and disciplined, because of his profoundness, he was difficult to approach, like the blazing glory of a fire of asceticism.

original: bsam gtan la goms par byas pas 'dod chags kyi yul bzang po nye bar gyur kyang dbang po dul zhing ma 'khrugs pas ni mdzes /
analyzed: bsam gtan la goms par byas pas 'dod chags kyi yul bzang po nye bar gyur kyang dbang po dul zhing ma 'khrugs pas ni mdzes /
translated: Because he had cultivated concentration, even though he was in the presence of excellent objects of desire, he was beautiful because his senses were disciplined and undisturbed.

analyzed: chos mngon sum du mthong ba bzhin du bkra shis shing bsod nams dang ni ldan par shing drung du stan bting ba la 'dug pa mthong bar gyur to //
translated: He was sitting on a seat that had been prepared at the foot of a tree, just as if he were directly seeing the Dharma, and was auspicious and endowed with merit.

original: de nas rgyal po de'i btsun mo de dag de'i dka' thub kyi gzi byin gyis sems zil gyis non pas /
analyzed: de nas rgyal po de'i btsun mo de dag de'i dka' thub kyi gzi byin gyis sems zil gyis non pas /
translated: Then, because of the splendor of his austerities, the minds of the king's queens were overwhelmed.

original: mthong ma thag tu g-yeng ba dang 'dzum 'phyar ba dang 'dod pa btang ste /🔽dul zhing gus par byas te /
analyzed: mthong ma thag tu g-yeng ba dang 'dzum 'phyar ba dang 'dod pa btang ste / dul zhing gus par byas te /
translated: As soon as they saw him, their distractions, smiles, and desires were abandoned.🔽They approached him in a disciplined and respectful manner

original: de'i drung du lhags nas bsnyen bkur byas so //
analyzed: de'i drung du lhags nas bsnyen bkur byas so //
translated: and served him.

original: des kyang de dag la 'dir 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig snyan pa brjod nas /
analyzed: des kyang de dag la 'dir 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig snyan pa brjod nas /
translated: And they said to them, Welcome! and so on, with pleasant words.

original: mgron 'ongs pa dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rim gro byas te /
analyzed: mgron 'ongs pa dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rim gro byas te /
translated: They made the guests happy with the service they provided.

original: de dag la nad dri ba'i skabs nas gleng bslangs te /
analyzed: de dag la nad dri ba'i skabs nas gleng bslangs te /
translated: And they began the conversation with the question, How are you?

original: chos kyi gtam bud med kyis go bar sla ba dpe dang bcas pa rnams kyis de rnams la mgron byas so //
analyzed: chos kyi gtam bud med kyis go bar sla ba dpe dang bcas pa rnams kyis de rnams la mgron byas so //
translated: They entertained them with Dharma stories that were easy for women to understand, and with parables.

original: mi yi lus su gyur pa ma smad thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: mi yi lus su gyur pa ma smad thob par 'gyur //
translated: They will obtain a human body, a body of a son, and a body of a wife.

original: de bzhin dbang po rnams kyang ma nyams snod dang ldan //
analyzed: de bzhin dbang po rnams kyang ma nyams snod dang ldan //
translated: And, Their faculties will be unimpaired, and they will be fit vessels.

original: 'on kyang 'chi bdag des ni legs par mi byed nges //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'chi bdag des ni legs par mi byed nges //
translated: But the Lord of Death will certainly not treat them well.

original: bag med gyur pa de dag nyin re bslus par 'gyur//
analyzed: bag med gyur pa de dag nyin re bslus par 'gyur//
translated: They will be deceived by him, day after day, while they are heedless.

original: rab tu sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs ma sbyangs na //
analyzed: rab tu sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs ma sbyangs na //
translated: If they do not train in generosity, morality, and so on,🔽 And if they do not train in patience, effort, concentration, and wisdom,

original: rigs dang gzugs dang lang tsho'i yon tan rnams dang ni //
analyzed: rigs dang gzugs dang lang tsho'i yon tan rnams dang ni //
translated: Even if they have the qualities of a good family, a good body, and youth,

original: stobs ni rab tu che zhing nor gyis phyug gyur kyang //
analyzed: stobs ni rab tu che zhing nor gyis phyug gyur kyang //
translated: And even if they are very strong and rich,🔽 And even if they are very famous and have many friends,

original: phyi ma'i tshe la su yang bde ba thob mi 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi ma'i tshe la su yang bde ba thob mi 'gyur //
translated: No one will attain happiness in the next life.

original: rigs la sogs pa dman yang sdig la ma chags shing //
analyzed: rigs la sogs pa dman yang sdig la ma chags shing //
translated: Even if one’s family and so forth are low, if one is not attached to evil,

original: rab tu sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs yon tan ldan //
analyzed: rab tu sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs yon tan ldan //
translated: and possesses qualities such as generosity and moral discipline,

original: dbyar gyi dus na 'bab chus rgya mtsho gang ba bzhin //
analyzed: dbyar gyi dus na 'bab chus rgya mtsho gang ba bzhin //
translated: then just as a river fills the ocean in the rainy season,

original: phyi ma'i tshe la nges par bde ba rgyas par 'gyur //
analyzed: phyi ma'i tshe la nges par bde ba rgyas par 'gyur //
translated: one will certainly experience an abundance of happiness in the next life.

original: rigs dang gzugs dang lus kyi yon tan rnams kyang rung //
analyzed: rigs dang gzugs dang lus kyi yon tan rnams kyang rung //
translated: Whether one has a good family, a good body, or good qualities,

original: stobs ni rab tu che zhing nor gyis phyug kyang rung //
analyzed: stobs ni rab tu che zhing nor gyis phyug kyang rung //
translated: whether one is very strong or very wealthy,

original: yon tan @105b yod na tshe 'di la yang rgyan du 'gyur //
analyzed: yon tan @105b yod na tshe 'di la yang rgyan du 'gyur //
translated: if one has good qualities, it is an ornament in this life,

original: gser gyi phreng bas phyug po'i mtshan ma bstan pa bzhin //
analyzed: gser gyi phreng bas phyug po'i mtshan ma bstan pa bzhin //
translated: just as a golden necklace is an ornament for the wealthy.

original: me tog rnams ni ljon pa'i shing gi rgyan du 'gyur //🔽glog phreng 'gyu ba char sprin rnams kyi rgyan du 'gyur //
analyzed: me tog rnams ni ljon pa'i shing gi rgyan du 'gyur // glog phreng 'gyu ba char sprin rnams kyi rgyan du 'gyur //
translated: Flowers are an ornament for trees,🔽a flash of lightning is an ornament for clouds,

original: bung ba myos pa 'du ba padma mtsho yi rgyan //
analyzed: bung ba myos pa 'du ba padma mtsho yi rgyan //
translated: and a gathering of intoxicated bees is an ornament for a lotus lake.

original: yon tan khyad par 'phags pa lus can rnams kyi rgyan //
analyzed: yon tan khyad par 'phags pa lus can rnams kyi rgyan //

analyzed: rgyal po'i 'khor ni rab tu 'khrug par gyur pa dang / rgyal po'i blon po rnams kyis thub pa de'i dka' thub kyi mthu che ba dang / rgyal po de sa'i 'og tu song ba yang de las gyur par shes nas /

analyzed: de ni khyod kyi dmod pas mi shis song //

analyzed: bram ze nyes pa med pa bsreg mi rigs // de bas rgyal po 'di yi yul 'di kun //

analyzed: yon tan chos kyis rang gi phyogs bzhin bsrung //

analyzed: de nas mi de rnams la byang chub sems dpas dbugs phyung ste smras pa /

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa dag ma 'jigs shig / bdag ni nags na gnas pa la //

analyzed: de la sdig tu ma gyur cig /'chi dang na ba'i sdug bsngal can //

analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang dbang du gyur ;

original: / nyes par spyad pas tshig pa la //

analyzed: mya ngan byed mod ga la khro //

analyzed: gal te bcos su rung na de yi sdig / bdag la rnam par smin par gyur kyang rung // bde ba can la sdug bsngal rjes 'brang zhing //

analyzed: sdug bsngal skyes na kun gyis myong bar 'gyur //

analyzed: de bas skyel 'khon du bzung mi rigs //

analyzed: de med sdug @109b bsngal ci zhig ci las gyur //

analyzed: rgyal pos smras pa /

analyzed: 'phags pa 'di bdag gis ci ltar yid ches par bgyi /

analyzed: rgyal po chen po 'di rab tu gsal te /

analyzed: nyi zla skar mas brgyan pa'i nam mkha' dang // dud 'gro brtag pa'i rnam pa mang po 'di //

analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol yod par de las mngon // mngal na 'dug pa'i sngon rol blo de ni //

analyzed: de ma thag pa'i tshe rabs snga ma'i blo // shes bya rtogs par byed pa'i blo yin zer //

analyzed: de bas skye sogs blo ni yul yod gyur //

original: de yi blo ni 'jig rten pha rol yin //
analyzed: de yi blo ni 'jig rten pha rol yin //

original: skye dgu tshul khrims la sogs bye brag rnams //
analyzed: skye dgu tshul khrims la sogs bye brag rnams //

analyzed: pha ma'i rang bzhin dag dang mi mthun snang //

original: glo bur gyur pa gang yang grub pa med //
analyzed: glo bur gyur pa gang yang grub pa med //

original: de bas tshe rabs gzhan la goms de yin //
analyzed: de bas tshe rabs gzhan la goms de yin //

original: bcas ma thag tu sus kyang ma bstan par //
analyzed: bcas ma thag tu sus kyang ma bstan par //

analyzed: nu zho 'thung ba rtsol bar byed pa dang // kha zas bza' bar rtsol bar byed pa yang //

original: de dang de 'dra'i las la slob lobs pa //
analyzed: de dang de 'dra'i las la slob lobs pa //

analyzed: goms par byas pas mkhas par gyur par grub //

analyzed: padma rnams ni 'byed dang 'dzums pa dag / srid pa gzhan la spyod pa goms las gyur //

analyzed: ces zer ba'i dogs pa de yang skyes pa mi rigs so //

original: dus nges pa dang ma nges pa las 'gyur ba snang ba dang / 'bad pa rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dus nges pa dang ma nges pa las 'gyur ba snang ba dang / 'bad pa rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i phyir te /

analyzed: padma kha 'byed 'dzums la dus nges yod //

original: nu zho 'thung bar rtsol la dus nges med //

original: padma mi rtsol nu zho 'thud bar rtsol //
analyzed: padma mi rtsol nu zho 'thud bar rtsol //

analyzed: de yi skyin po srid pa gzhan du gser srang stong sbyin no //

analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpas /

analyzed: de spyi brtol che ba la goms shing 'dzem dogs med la /

analyzed: log par lta ba'i dug gi sgregs pa dang 'dra ba'i mi rigs pa'i tshig de'i lan rigs pa'i tshul gyis smras pa /

analyzed: 'di la'ang re zhig nor ni 'byor par 'dod pa @111b yis ;

analyzed: / bdag nyid ngan pa dag la nor ni yong mi gtong //

original: brkam dang mi mkhas le lo can la'ang nor mi gtong //
analyzed: brkam dang mi mkhas le lo can la'ang nor mi gtong //

original: de dag la ni btang na de nyid zad pa'i mthar //
analyzed: de dag la ni btang na de nyid zad pa'i mthar //

analyzed: de la byin na nor ni 'phel bar 'gyur //

original: lta ba ngan pa spyod pa khyod la ni //
analyzed: lta ba ngan pa spyod pa khyod la ni //

analyzed: nor rnams byin yang don ni med par 'gyur //

analyzed: lta ba ngan pa'i skyon gyur mi bzad pa'i//

original: bdag gi las kyis khyod ni dmyal bar ltung //

original: sems nyams nad kyis gdungs par gyur pa la //

analyzed: de na nyi zla'i 'od zer rnams kyis kyang //

translated: Some are struck on the head with iron hammers, and wail in distress.

original: kha cig gsal shing chen pos lus brgyangs du ba @112b med pa'i me la rab tu bsreg / gzhan yang lcags kyi khu ba ma ltar 'bar ba blud nas mkhun sgra 'byin //
analyzed: kha cig gsal shing chen pos lus brgyangs du ba @112b med pa'i me la rab tu bsreg / gzhan yang lcags kyi khu ba ma ltar 'bar ba blud nas mkhun sgra 'byin //
translated: Others, having been given molten iron to drink, are made to moan.

original: la la sna tshogs khyi rnams stobs chen gyis //
analyzed: la la sna tshogs khyi rnams stobs chen gyis //
translated: Some, by the powerful dogs of various kinds,

original: mche ba rnon po'i so yis rab tu 'drad //
analyzed: mche ba rnon po'i so yis rab tu 'drad //
translated: are torn apart with their sharp fangs.

original: lus kyi sha rnams btogs pas srab mor gyur //
analyzed: lus kyi sha rnams btogs pas srab mor gyur //
translated: Their bodies are stripped of flesh, and become thin.

original: dman pa'i sgra 'byin gcom chung du zhing 'gyel //
analyzed: dman pa'i sgra 'byin gcom chung du zhing 'gyel //
translated: They emit low moans, and fall down.

original: dmyal ba mi bzad de lta bu ni mi bde ba //
analyzed: dmyal ba mi bzad de lta bu ni mi bde ba //
translated: Such is the unbearable hell, which is not pleasant.

original: bdag gi las kyis 'phangs nas myong ba de yi tshe //
analyzed: bdag gi las kyis 'phangs nas myong ba de yi tshe //
translated: When I am cast down by my own karma, and experience it,

original: mya ngan sems gdungs 'jigs shing nyam thag gyur pa la //
analyzed: mya ngan sems gdungs 'jigs shing nyam thag gyur pa la //
translated: my mind is tormented by grief, and I am frightened and terrified.

original: de tshe su zhig khyod la bu lon ded du 'gro //
analyzed: de tshe su zhig khyod la bu lon ded du 'gro //
translated: At that time, who will come to collect a debt from you?

original: lcags kyi rdza chen rab tu me 'bar rnyed dka' ba //
analyzed: lcags kyi rdza chen rab tu me 'bar rnyed dka' ba //
translated: In a great iron pot, which is difficult to find, and is burning with fire,

original: mi bzad nang na 'gro ngan lus rnams slong gyur cing //
analyzed: mi bzad nang na 'gro ngan lus rnams slong gyur cing //
translated: in that unbearable place, the bodies of the evil-doers are boiled,

original: rab tu bskol ba'i shugs kyis dbang med rnam par 'gyur //
analyzed: rab tu bskol ba'i shugs kyis dbang med rnam par 'gyur //
translated: and by the power of the boiling, they are helplessly transformed.

original: de tshe su zhig khyod la bu lon ded du 'gro //
analyzed: de tshe su zhig khyod la bu lon ded du 'gro //
translated: Who will then come to collect a debt from you?

original: sa gzhi me 'bar du ba med pa ser po la //
analyzed: sa gzhi me 'bar du ba med pa ser po la //
translated: The ground will be a blazing fire without smoke,

original: lcags kyi phur pa me 'bar brgya yis lus brgyangs nas //
analyzed: lcags kyi phur pa me 'bar brgya yis lus brgyangs nas //
translated: And your body will be stretched out on a hundred blazing iron spikes.

original: rab tu lus bsregs snying rjer rung bar du ba na //
analyzed: rab tu lus bsregs snying rjer rung bar du ba na //
translated: Your body will be burning, and you will be in a pitiful state,

original: de tshe khyod la su zhig bu lon ded du 'gro //
analyzed: de tshe khyod la su zhig bu lon ded du 'gro //
translated: Who will then come to collect a debt from you?

original: rab tu mnar ba'i gnas na 'dug pa na //
analyzed: rab tu mnar ba'i gnas na 'dug pa na //
translated: When you are in a place of extreme torment,

original: de tshe sdug bsngal chen po myong 'gyur bas //
analyzed: de tshe sdug bsngal chen po myong 'gyur bas //
translated: And you are experiencing great suffering,

original: tshig gi lan kyang smra bar mi nus na //
analyzed: tshig gi lan kyang smra bar mi nus na //
translated: And you are unable to even speak a word in reply,

original: de tshe khyod la su zhig bu lon ded du 'gro //
analyzed: de tshe khyod la su zhig bu lon ded du 'gro //
translated: Who will then come to collect a debt from you?

original: khu yug rlung gis rab tu bdas gyur zhing //
analyzed: khu yug rlung gis rab tu bdas gyur zhing //
translated: When you are blown by the wind of karma,

original: mkhun pa'i sgra yang 'byin par mi nus pas //
analyzed: mkhun pa'i sgra yang 'byin par mi nus pas //
translated: And you are unable to even utter a cry of distress,

original: rus pa'i rgya zhig phongs pa'i sgra 'byin pa //
analyzed: rus pa'i rgya zhig phongs pa'i sgra 'byin pa //
translated: And you are reduced to a skeleton, a pitiful sight,

original: phyi ma'i tshe la su zhig nor ded yong //🔽gshin rje'i gshed pos bsad par gyur pa'am //
analyzed: phyi ma'i tshe la su zhig nor ded yong // gshin rje'i gshed pos bsad par gyur pa'am //
translated: Who will then come to collect a debt from you?🔽When you are killed by Yama’s henchmen,

original: rab tu 'bar ba'i me yis tshig pa'am //
analyzed: rab tu 'bar ba'i me yis tshig pa'am //
translated: Or burned by the blazing fire,

original: sha dang khrag rnams khyer zhing za bas na //
analyzed: sha dang khrag rnams khyer zhing za bas na //
translated: “They take away your flesh and blood and eat it.

original: su zhig khyod la nor slong sdug bsngal myong //
analyzed: su zhig khyod la nor slong sdug bsngal myong //
translated: Who would suffer, asking you for money?🔽“ ‘You are always suffering from many harms:🔽being killed, cut, gashed, beaten,

original: bsad dang bcad dang gshags dang brdeg pa dang // bsreg dang bzhog dang brdung dang gzhig pa dang // gnod pa mang pos rtag tu sdug bsngal na //
analyzed: bsad dang bcad dang gshags dang brdeg pa dang // bsreg dang bzhog dang brdung dang gzhig pa dang // gnod pa mang pos rtag tu sdug bsngal na //
translated: burned, scalded, crushed, and destroyed.

original: de tshe ji ltar nga la bu lon btsal //
analyzed: de tshe ji ltar nga la bu lon btsal //
translated: At that time, how can I demand payment from you?’

original: de nas rgyal pho des sems can dmyal ba'i gtam rab tu 'jigs su rung ba de thos nas mi dga' bar gyur te /
analyzed: de nas rgyal pho des sems can dmyal ba'i gtam rab tu 'jigs su rung ba de thos nas mi dga' bar gyur te /
translated: “Then the king, having heard that story of the hells, which was extremely terrifying, became unhappy.

original: log par lta ba la rjes su chags pa ni btang /
analyzed: log par lta ba la rjes su chags pa ni btang /
translated: He gave up his attachment to wrong views.

original: 'jig rten pha rol yod par yid ches par gyur nas /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol yod par yid ches par gyur nas /
translated: He became convinced that there is a world beyond.

original: drang srong chen po de la phyag 'tshal te smras pa //
analyzed: drang srong chen po de la phyag 'tshal te smras pa //
translated: He bowed to that great sage and said:

original: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bdag gis thos nas su//
analyzed: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal bdag gis thos nas su//
translated: ‘Having heard about the sufferings of the hells,🔽my mind is terrified with fear.

original: @113a * // bdag gi yid ni 'jigs pas rnam par skrag / de dag bdag gis ji ltar myong gyur snyam //
analyzed: @113a * // bdag gi yid ni 'jigs pas rnam par skrag / de dag bdag gis ji ltar myong gyur snyam //
translated: I wonder how I will experience them.’

original: rnam rtog me yis bdag ni bsregs pa bzhin //
analyzed: rnam rtog me yis bdag ni bsregs pa bzhin //
translated: I am as if burned by the fire of discursive thoughts.

original: bdag gi sems ni lta ngan lhung gyur zhing //
analyzed: bdag gi sems ni lta ngan lhung gyur zhing //
translated: My mind has fallen into bad views,

original: yun ring ma mthong ngan pa'i lam du song //
analyzed: yun ring ma mthong ngan pa'i lam du song //
translated: And for a long time I have not seen the good path.

original: 'di la dge ba'i gnas su khyod kyis mthong //
analyzed: 'di la dge ba'i gnas su khyod kyis mthong //
translated: You see this as a place of virtue.

original: thub pa khyod ni bdag gi mgon dang skyabs //
analyzed: thub pa khyod ni bdag gi mgon dang skyabs //
translated: Sage, you are my protector and refuge.

original: bdag gi lta ngan mun pa khyod kyis bsal //
analyzed: bdag gi lta ngan mun pa khyod kyis bsal //
translated: You have dispelled the darkness of my bad views,

original: nyi ma shar bas mun nag bsal ba bzhin //🔽gang gis bdag ni ngan 'gror mi ltung ba //
analyzed: nyi ma shar bas mun nag bsal ba bzhin // gang gis bdag ni ngan 'gror mi ltung ba //
translated: Just as when the sun rises, it dispels the darkness.🔽Please tell me the path

original: de 'dra'i lam ni bdag la bshad du gsol //
analyzed: de 'dra'i lam ni bdag la bshad du gsol //
translated: By which I will not fall into the lower realms.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyal po de yid mi dga' bar gyur te lta ba drang por gyur nas chos bsgrub nus pa'i snod du gyur pa mthong nas /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyal po de yid mi dga' bar gyur te lta ba drang por gyur nas chos bsgrub nus pa'i snod du gyur pa mthong nas /
translated: Then the bodhisattva, seeing that the king had become displeased, his view had become straight, and he had become a vessel capable of practicing the Dharma,

original: pha bu la snying brtse ba dang / slob dpon slob ma la snying brtse ba bzhin du 'di ltar rjes su bstan to //
analyzed: pha bu la snying brtse ba dang / slob dpon slob ma la snying brtse ba bzhin du 'di ltar rjes su bstan to //
translated: Taught him in this way, with the affection of a father for his son and the affection of a master for his disciple:

original: sngon gyi rgyal po yon tan dga' ba rnams //
analyzed: sngon gyi rgyal po yon tan dga' ba rnams //
translated: The kings of the past who delighted in virtue,

original: slob ma mchog tshul dge sbyong bram ze dang // 'bangs la'ang ngang tshul snying rje ldan bstan pa //
analyzed: slob ma mchog tshul dge sbyong bram ze dang // 'bangs la'ang ngang tshul snying rje ldan bstan pa //
translated: He taught morality to the best of his disciples, to the brahmans and ascetics, and even to the servants.

original: grags ldan de ni mtho ris 'gro ba'i lam //
analyzed: grags ldan de ni mtho ris 'gro ba'i lam //
translated: This famous one went on the path to heaven.

original: de bas chos min thub dga' thub byed cing //
analyzed: de bas chos min thub dga' thub byed cing //
translated: Therefore, he who delights in the sage’s dharma should practice asceticism.

original: ser sna dor dka' ring du bor nas su //
analyzed: ser sna dor dka' ring du bor nas su //
translated: Having cast far away miserliness, which is difficult to cast away,

original: lha dbang pho brang gser gyi rta babs can //
analyzed: lha dbang pho brang gser gyi rta babs can //
translated: he went to the palace of the lord of gods, which has golden stairways,

original: rin chen mchog 'bar de ni 'bar bzhin song //
analyzed: rin chen mchog 'bar de ni 'bar bzhin song //
translated: and which is ablaze with the light of the best of jewels.

original: yang dag lta la khyod yid 'dris par gyis //
analyzed: yang dag lta la khyod yid 'dris par gyis //
translated: You should familiarize your mind with the correct view.

original: skye bo mchog rnams lta ba blo gnas te //
analyzed: skye bo mchog rnams lta ba blo gnas te //
translated: The view of the best of people is that the mind is stable.

original: byis pa dga' byed skye bo'i lta ba spongs //
analyzed: byis pa dga' byed skye bo'i lta ba spongs //
translated: Abandon the view of the people who delight in childishness.

original: chos nyid nges pa gang dag bstan la rtogs //
analyzed: chos nyid nges pa gang dag bstan la rtogs //
translated: Understand the nature of reality, which is taught in the scriptures.

original: da ni khyod kyis yang dag lta dge zhing //
analyzed: da ni khyod kyis yang dag lta dge zhing //
translated: Now, you should have the virtue of the correct view,

original: rgyal po'i tshul gyis 'gro bar 'dod par gyis //
analyzed: rgyal po'i tshul gyis 'gro bar 'dod par gyis //
translated: and you should go forth with the manner of a king.

original: yon tan mi dga' sems de med par byos //
analyzed: yon tan mi dga' sems de med par byos //
translated: You should eliminate the mind that does not delight in virtue.

original: de nyid sems kyi go 'phang lam du gyur //
analyzed: de nyid sems kyi go 'phang lam du gyur //
translated: That itself is the path to the state of mind.

original: de bas yon tan bsgrub pa'i dbyig tu byos //
analyzed: de bas yon tan bsgrub pa'i dbyig tu byos //
translated: Therefore, you should make it your treasure to accomplish virtue.

original: bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dod snying rje bskyed //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dod snying rje bskyed //
translated: You will have compassion, wishing to benefit both yourself and others.

original: tshul khrims brtan zhing dbang po rab tu sdoms //
analyzed: tshul khrims brtan zhing dbang po rab tu sdoms //
translated: You will be steadfast in morality and will control your senses.

original: de yis phyi ma'i tshe la khyod mi sdug /
analyzed: de yis phyi ma'i tshe la khyod mi sdug /
translated: In future lives, you will not be ugly,

original: rang gi bsod nams rgyal po'i dpal gyi gzi //
analyzed: rang gi bsod nams rgyal po'i dpal gyi gzi //
translated: but will have the splendor of the glory of a king, your own merit.

original: mdza' bshes rnams la rab gsal yid 'ong dka' //
analyzed: mdza' bshes rnams la rab gsal yid 'ong dka' //
translated: You will be radiant and attractive to your friends.

original: grags pa snyan pas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal //
analyzed: grags pa snyan pas 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal //
translated: You will dispel the suffering of the world with your fame and renown.

original: bdag gi don dang ldan pa'i phan pa spyod //
analyzed: bdag gi don dang ldan pa'i phan pa spyod //
translated: You will practice the benefit that is connected with your own aim.🔽Here, your chariot will be the giving of respect;

original: khyod 'dir bkur sti spyin pa'i shing rta dag / rang lus yon tan 'byung pa'i shing rta @113b nyid ;
analyzed: khyod 'dir bkur sti spyin pa'i shing rta dag / rang lus yon tan 'byung pa'i shing rta @113b nyid ;
translated: your own body will be the chariot that produces good qualities;

original: / mig rtsub mig ldan sbyin dul 'khor lo can //
analyzed: / mig rtsub mig ldan sbyin dul 'khor lo can //
translated: your eyes will be the eyes of a benefactor; your retinue will be the wheel of generosity and self-control;

original: bsod nams 'dod pa'i shing rta'i mda' dang ldan //
analyzed: bsod nams 'dod pa'i shing rta'i mda' dang ldan //
translated: your arrows will be the chariot of the desire for merit;

original: dbang po dul rta dran pa'i srab skyogs can //
analyzed: dbang po dul rta dran pa'i srab skyogs can //
translated: your horse will be the self-control of your senses; your reins will be mindfulness;

original: blo gros lcags ldan thos pa rgya chen brtson //
analyzed: blo gros lcags ldan thos pa rgya chen brtson //
translated: your iron will be your intelligence; your hearing will be your great effort;

original: ngo tsha yo byad ngan grogs mdzes pas bcings //
analyzed: ngo tsha yo byad ngan grogs mdzes pas bcings //
translated: your harness will be shame; your beautiful companions will be the good friends;

original: bzod pa'i gnya' shing des 'gro brtan pas brtan //
analyzed: bzod pa'i gnya' shing des 'gro brtan pas brtan //
translated: your yoke will be patience; your stability will be steadfastness.

original: tshig ngan bsdoms pas mi snyan sgra mi 'byin //
analyzed: tshig ngan bsdoms pas mi snyan sgra mi 'byin //
translated: He does not utter unpleasant words, even if they are true.

original: yid 'ong tshig tsam smra bas zab pa'i sgra //
analyzed: yid 'ong tshig tsam smra bas zab pa'i sgra //
translated: He speaks only pleasant words, even if they are not true.

original: gdams pa ma zhig pas na mtshams ma byed //
analyzed: gdams pa ma zhig pas na mtshams ma byed //
translated: He does not make a fence, since he does not destroy the instructions.

original: spyod pa ngan pa'i gya gyu spangs pas drangs //
analyzed: spyod pa ngan pa'i gya gyu spangs pas drangs //
translated: He is straightforward, since he has abandoned the crookedness of bad conduct.🔽He is the banner of this vehicle, the banner of fame,

original: theg pa 'di dang grags pa'i ru mtshon dang // snying rje bskyal zhing zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan mtho //
analyzed: theg pa 'di dang grags pa'i ru mtshon dang // snying rje bskyal zhing zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan mtho //
translated: the banner of compassion, and the banner of peace.

original: bdag dang gzhan don ma rmongs gsal spyod pas //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan don ma rmongs gsal spyod pas //
translated: He is not confused about the benefit of self and other, and he acts clearly.

original: rgyal po nam yang dmyal bar yong mi ltung //
analyzed: rgyal po nam yang dmyal bar yong mi ltung //
translated: Such a king will never fall into the hells.

original: de ltar bdag nyid chen po nges /
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid chen po nges /
translated: In this way, the great being

original: rgyal po de'i lta ba log pa'i mun nag de tshig gsal ba'i nyi ma shar bas bsal nas /
analyzed: rgyal po de'i lta ba log pa'i mun nag de tshig gsal ba'i nyi ma shar bas bsal nas /
translated: cleared away the darkness of the king’s wrong views with the sun of clear words,

original: de la bde 'gro'i lam yang bstan te /
analyzed: de la bde 'gro'i lam yang bstan te /
translated: and he showed him the path to the happy realms.

original: de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
analyzed: de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
translated: Then he disappeared right there.

original: de nas rgyal po 'jig rten pha rol yod pa'i don yang dag par ni rtogs yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems ni rnyed nas /
analyzed: de nas rgyal po 'jig rten pha rol yod pa'i don yang dag par ni rtogs yang dag pa'i lta ba'i sems ni rnyed nas /
translated: Then the king truly understood the meaning of the existence of the next world, and he attained the mind of the correct view.

original: blon po dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dag sbyin pa dang dul ba dang sdom pa la gzhol bar gyur to //
analyzed: blon po dang pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang bcas pa dag sbyin pa dang dul ba dang sdom pa la gzhol bar gyur to //
translated: and the ministers and the court were devoted to generosity, self-control, and restraint.

original: de lta bas na log par lta ba ni kha na ma tho ba rab tu che ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta bas na log par lta ba ni kha na ma tho ba rab tu che ba'i phyir /
translated: Thus, wrong views are a very great offense.

original: log par lta ba la zhen pa rnams la dam pa rnams kyis lhag par rjes su brtse bar bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: log par lta ba la zhen pa rnams la dam pa rnams kyis lhag par rjes su brtse bar bya bar rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is right that the holy ones should have special compassion for those who are attached to wrong views.

original: de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs par mnyan pa ni dad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs par mnyan pa ni dad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, listening to the holy Dharma brings about the completion of faith.

original: zhes kyang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes kyang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should also be applied in the same way.

original: de bzhin du gzhin las chos mnyan na yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba'i rkyen du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhin las chos mnyan na yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba'i rkyen du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, listening to the Dharma from a teacher who is not a holy person becomes a condition for the arising of right views.

original: zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: This should also be applied in the same way.

original: de ltar na skyes bu dam pa rnams ni brnyas thabs byas kyang bzod pa la goms par byas pas de la phan pa'i man ngag ston par byed kyi tshig rtsub mo ni mi smra'o //
analyzed: de ltar na skyes bu dam pa rnams ni brnyas thabs byas kyang bzod pa la goms par byas pas de la phan pa'i man ngag ston par byed kyi tshig rtsub mo ni mi smra'o //
translated: Thus, even when insulted, holy beings, through their practice of patience, teach the methods of benefitting others, but do not speak harsh words.

original: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: Thus, it is also to be said with regard to the praise of the qualities of the Tathāgatas.

original: skyo zhing yid 'byung bar byas nas myur du legs pa'i lam la phyogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: skyo zhing yid 'byung bar byas nas myur du legs pa'i lam la phyogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: Because, having become weary and disgusted, one quickly turns to the good path.

original: skyo zhing yid 'byung bar bya ba'i gtam bya ba la brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: skyo zhing yid 'byung bar bya ba'i gtam bya ba la brjod par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, it is to be said with regard to the discourse that causes weariness and disgust.

original: tshangs par skyes pa'i rabs te nyi shu dgu @114a * //
analyzed: tshangs par skyes pa'i rabs te nyi shu dgu @114a * //
translated: The Chapter on Brahma’s Birth is the twenty-ninth.

original: pa'o ; // / bam po bcu gcig pa /
analyzed: pa'o ; // / bam po bcu gcig pa /
translated: Chapter Thirty

original: dge ba rnams ni phyis gzhan la phan par 'gyur na /
analyzed: dge ba rnams ni phyis gzhan la phan par 'gyur na /
translated: When the virtuous later benefit others,

original: sdug bsngal yang khe rnyed pa dang 'dra bar sems so //
analyzed: sdug bsngal yang khe rnyed pa dang 'dra bar sems so //
translated: they think of suffering as if it were gaining profit.

original: de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i nags tshal shing ljon pa gzhon nu bzang po'i rtse mo me tog dang 'bras bu dang shing lor ldan pa rnams kyis de dang de dag tu brgyan pa bzhin du 'dug pa /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i nags tshal shing ljon pa gzhon nu bzang po'i rtse mo me tog dang 'bras bu dang shing lor ldan pa rnams kyis de dang de dag tu brgyan pa bzhin du 'dug pa /
translated: In this way, the Bodhisattva was like a young, beautiful elephant in the forest, adorned here and there with the tips of trees bearing flowers, fruits, and leaves.

original: ldum bu dang / shing gel ba dang / rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khebs pa'i sa phyogs na /
analyzed: ldum bu dang / shing gel ba dang / rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khebs pa'i sa phyogs na /
translated: He lived in a place covered with various kinds of grass, vines, and roots.

original: ri'i ljongs rnams na nags tshal nyams dga' ba la snying chags nas gzhan du g-yeng ba med par gnas bcas pa bzhin du ni 'dug / nags na rgyu ba rnams kyi gnas su ni gyur /
analyzed: ri'i ljongs rnams na nags tshal nyams dga' ba la snying chags nas gzhan du g-yeng ba med par gnas bcas pa bzhin du ni 'dug / nags na rgyu ba rnams kyi gnas su ni gyur /
translated: He stayed in the delightful forests of the mountain regions, as if he had made a vow not to go anywhere else.

original: mtsho zab mo rgya chen pos ni dgon pa dang bcas par byas /
