analyzed: rab tu legs par byed byed pa 'di'i sha za sus phod /
translated: Who would eat his flesh?

original: bdag cag gis 'di la mchod pa byed cing mer bsreg pa'i zhal ta byas la drin lan blan pa rigs so snyam nas /
analyzed: bdag cag gis 'di la mchod pa byed cing mer bsreg pa'i zhal ta byas la drin lan blan pa rigs so snyam nas /
translated: We should repay his kindness by making offerings to him and cremating his body.

original: mi de rnams nye du shi ba bzhin du sems mya ngan gyis gdungs te /
analyzed: mi de rnams nye du shi ba bzhin du sems mya ngan gyis gdungs te /
translated: Like people whose relatives have died, they were tormented by grief.

original: mig ni mchi mas gang skad ni 'dzer ba la bltas nas /
analyzed: mig ni mchi mas gang skad ni 'dzer ba la bltas nas /
translated: Their eyes filled with tears and their voices choked up.

original: sems brtan po kha cig gis don la brtags te smras pa /
analyzed: sems brtan po kha cig gis don la brtags te smras pa /
translated: Some of them, with steady minds, examined the facts and said,

original: de ltar byas pas glang po che mchog 'di la bdag cag gis mchod cing bkur sti byas par mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ltar byas pas glang po che mchog 'di la bdag cag gis mchod cing bkur sti byas par mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: If we do this, we will not have made offerings and shown respect to this supreme elephant.

original: 'di'i bsam pa rdzogs par byas nas /
analyzed: 'di'i bsam pa rdzogs par byas nas /
translated: We should fulfill his wishes.

original: 'di la bdag cag gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo //
analyzed: 'di la bdag cag gis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo //
translated: Then we will have made offerings to him.

original: bdag cag rnams ni bsgral ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag cag rnams ni bsgral ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to liberate us,

original: sngon chad ma 'dris gnyen 'di yis //
analyzed: sngon chad ma 'dris gnyen 'di yis //
translated: this friend, whom we have never met before,

original: rab tu phangs pa'i lus btang nas //
analyzed: rab tu phangs pa'i lus btang nas //
translated: has given up his very dear body

original: rab tu gces pa'i mgron byas pas //🔽de bas de yi bsam rdzogs par //
analyzed: rab tu gces pa'i mgron byas pas // de bas de yi bsam rdzogs par //
translated: and has served as a very dear guest.

original: bdag cag rnams kyis bya bar rigs //
analyzed: bdag cag rnams kyis bya bar rigs //
translated: Therefore, it is right that we should fulfill his wishes.

original: gzhan du byas na 'di lta bu //
analyzed: gzhan du byas na 'di lta bu //
translated: If we do otherwise, it will be like this.

original: 'di yis byas pa don med 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di yis byas pa don med 'gyur //
translated: What he has done will be meaningless.

original: de yis byams te ci bdog pa //
analyzed: de yis byams te ci bdog pa //
translated: He has been kind. Whatever he has

original: thams cad mgron du byas pa 'di //
analyzed: thams cad mgron du byas pa 'di //
translated: he has made it all into an offering.

original: bdag cag rnams kyis ma blangs na //
analyzed: bdag cag rnams kyis ma blangs na //
translated: If we do not accept it,

original: de la ci zhig bkur sti byed //
analyzed: de la ci zhig bkur sti byed //
translated: what hospitality can we offer him?

original: de bas de la bla ma bzhin //
analyzed: de bas de la bla ma bzhin //
translated: Therefore, as if he were our guru,

original: tshig ni mnyan par byas nas su //
analyzed: tshig ni mnyan par byas nas su //
translated: we should listen to his words

original: bkur sti chen po bya bar rigs //
analyzed: bkur sti chen po bya bar rigs //
translated: and it is right to show him great respect.

original: bdag cag rnams la'ang phan par 'gyur //
analyzed: bdag cag rnams la'ang phan par 'gyur //
translated: It will also be beneficial for us.

original: sdug bsngal 'di las thar nas chogs pa'am //
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'di las thar nas chogs pa'am //
translated: When we are free from this suffering,

original: so so nas ni glang po mchog 'di la //
analyzed: so so nas ni glang po mchog 'di la //
translated: each of us should do for this excellent elephant

original: bshes gnyen 'das pa dag la mchod pa bzhin //
analyzed: bshes gnyen 'das pa dag la mchod pa bzhin //
translated: what we would do for a friend who has passed away.

original: bya ba thams cad bdag cag rnams kyis bya //
analyzed: bya ba thams cad bdag cag rnams kyis bya //
translated: We should do everything for him.”

original: de nas mi de rnams mya ngam dgon pa de nas thar par bya ba'i phyir glang po che'i bdag po de'i bsam pa yang dran @118a * //🔽par byas te /
analyzed: de nas mi de rnams mya ngam dgon pa de nas thar par bya ba'i phyir glang po che'i bdag po de'i bsam pa yang dran @118a * // par byas te /
translated: Then, in order to free those people from the wilderness, they remembered the intentions of the lord of elephants.

original: de'i tshig mnyan nas sems dpa' chen po de'i sha rnams kyang blang /
analyzed: de'i tshig mnyan nas sems dpa' chen po de'i sha rnams kyang blang /
translated: Listening to his words, they took the flesh of the great being.

original: de'i rgyu ma rnams kyis kyang rkyal pa bzhin du chu snod byas nas chu yang blangs te des bstan pa'i sa phyogs de nas song ste /
analyzed: de'i rgyu ma rnams kyis kyang rkyal pa bzhin du chu snod byas nas chu yang blangs te des bstan pa'i sa phyogs de nas song ste /
translated: And the mother’s intestines, acting like a water pipe, took up the water and carried it to the place where the child was.

original: mya ngam dgon pa de nas thar te dong ngo //
analyzed: mya ngam dgon pa de nas thar te dong ngo //
translated: And so, having escaped from the desert wilderness, they went on their way.

original: de lta bas na dge ba rnams ni phyis gzhan la phan par 'gyur na /
analyzed: de lta bas na dge ba rnams ni phyis gzhan la phan par 'gyur na /
translated: So, if good people later benefit others,🔽even suffering is like a gain.

original: sdug bsngal yang khe rnyed pa dang 'dra bar sems so zhes skye bo dge ba rnams kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal yang khe rnyed pa dang 'dra bar sems so zhes skye bo dge ba rnams kyi yon tan bsngags pa la'ang brjod par bya'o //
translated: In this way, the praise of the good qualities of good people should be told.🔽And having generated praise and respect for the good qualities of the Tathāgatas, the holy Dharma should be listened to.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa dang rim gro bskyed de dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang / de ltar rang bzhin bzang po la goms par byas nas /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa dang rim gro bskyed de dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang / de ltar rang bzhin bzang po la goms par byas nas /
translated: And in this way, having become accustomed to a good nature,

original: tshe rabs gzhan la yang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro zhes rang bzhin bzang po bsgrub pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: tshe rabs gzhan la yang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro zhes rang bzhin bzang po bsgrub pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: it will follow in other lives as well. In this way, the praise of the good qualities of accomplishing a good nature should be told.

original: nor btong ba la goms par byas na bdag gi lus la phongs pa med pa yang thags thogs med par gtong ngo zhes gtong ba la goms pa'i yon tan bsngags pa la yang brjod par bya'o //

translated: And when you have become accustomed to giving away wealth, you will be able to give away your own body without hesitation.

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lha'i me tog dang sil snyan la sogs pas mchod pa'i tshe /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du / kun dga' bo de tsam gyis ni /

analyzed: nye ba'i rig byed dang bcas pa la ni mkhas par gyur pa /
translated: In due course he became skilled in the Vedas with their auxiliaries,🔽and in the upāngas.

analyzed: 'gro ba rnams kyi gnyen dang 'dra bar gyur to //
translated: He became a friend to all beings because he was skilled in benefiting and gathering them, because his respect increased more and more, and because he was determined to protect them.

original: tshul khrims thos dang gtong dang snying rje dul //
analyzed: tshul khrims thos dang gtong dang snying rje dul //

original: gzi byin bzod dang shes rab brtan dang byams //
analyzed: gzi byin bzod dang shes rab brtan dang byams //
translated: He was majestic, patient, wise, steadfast, and loving.

original: ma dregs ngo tsha byin che mdangs ldan grags //
analyzed: ma dregs ngo tsha byin che mdangs ldan grags //
translated: He was not arrogant, was modest, generous, radiant, and famous.

original: de la stobs chen stobs chen dag pa rnams //
analyzed: de la stobs chen stobs chen dag pa rnams //
translated: He was powerful, and his power was pure.

original: yon tan de dang de dag yod pa ni //
analyzed: yon tan de dang de dag yod pa ni //
translated: He possessed all those good qualities.

original: long tshor gyur pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bzhin //
analyzed: long tshor gyur pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa bzhin //
translated: He was adorned with ornaments that were not gaudy.

original: rnam par dag cing rgya cher yid 'ong ba //
analyzed: rnam par dag cing rgya cher yid 'ong ba //
translated: He was pure, vast, and attractive.

original: zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra ba'i gnas su gyur //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od zer 'dra ba'i gnas su gyur //
translated: He was a place that was like the light of the moon.

original: de nas de 'bangs rnams skyong nus pa dang ma 'jungs shing rang bzhin bzang ba'i phyir rgyal pos rgyal tshab kyi longs spyod byed du bcug go //
analyzed: de nas de 'bangs rnams skyong nus pa dang ma 'jungs shing rang bzhin bzang ba'i phyir rgyal pos rgyal tshab kyi longs spyod byed du bcug go //
translated: Then, because he was able to care for his subjects and was not stingy and was good-natured, the king appointed him to the position of crown prince.

original: rab tu mkhas pas chos ldan legs smra rnams //
analyzed: rab tu mkhas pas chos ldan legs smra rnams //
translated: The very wise ones who spoke Dharma well

original: de yi gnang chen bzhin du sdug par gyur //
analyzed: de yi gnang chen bzhin du sdug par gyur //
translated: became dear to him as if they were his own eyes.

original: gang dag de la legs par smra ba de //
analyzed: gang dag de la legs par smra ba de //
translated: Those who spoke well to him

original: mchod pa khyad par can gyis bkur sti byed //
analyzed: mchod pa khyad par can gyis bkur sti byed //
translated: he honored with special offerings.

original: de nas bdag nyid chen po de re zhig cig grong khyer dang nye ba'i skyed mos tshal dpyid kyi zla ba'i dus la bab pa'i mthus /
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid chen po de re zhig cig grong khyer dang nye ba'i skyed mos tshal dpyid kyi zla ba'i dus la bab pa'i mthus /
translated: Then, at one time, the Great Being, in the pleasure grove near the city,

analyzed: shing gi lo ma rnams ni mdzes shing 'jam par gyur /
translated: the trees had beautiful, soft leaves.

original: me tog sdug gu kha 'bus pa rnams ni dgod pa bzhin /
analyzed: me tog sdug gu kha 'bus pa rnams ni dgod pa bzhin /
translated: The lovely flowers that had bloomed were like a smile.

original: sa gzhi rnams ni ne'u gsing sngon po gsar pa rnams kyis ri mor bkram pa bzhin du mdzes par byas /
analyzed: sa gzhi rnams ni ne'u gsing sngon po gsar pa rnams kyis ri mor bkram pa bzhin du mdzes par byas /
translated: The ground was beautified as if it were covered with new blue carpets.

original: chu gtsang ma @119a * //
analyzed: chu gtsang ma @119a * //
translated: The clean water

original: rnams ni me tog padma dang / autpa la'i 'dab mas khebs bung ba mang po rnams ni dga' ba'i sgra 'byin /
analyzed: rnams ni me tog padma dang / autpa la'i 'dab mas khebs bung ba mang po rnams ni dga' ba'i sgra 'byin /
translated: was covered with lotus and utpala leaves, and many bees made a sound of delight.

original: bya ko ki la dang / rma bya rnams ni skra cher 'byin /
analyzed: bya ko ki la dang / rma bya rnams ni skra cher 'byin /
translated: Kokila and peacock birds sang loudly.

translated: A cool, fragrant, pleasant breeze arose, and he was surrounded by a small army that was very delightful.

analyzed: rtse ba'i phyir rgyu zhing song song ba las skyed mos tshal gzhan cig tu phyin to //

original: de ni nags tshal ko ki'i sgra 'byin pa /
analyzed: de ni nags tshal ko ki'i sgra 'byin pa /

original: lding khong rgyan can yid 'ong skyed mos tshal //
analyzed: lding khong rgyan can yid 'ong skyed mos tshal //

original: ljon shing sna tshogs me tog g-yur gyis dud //
analyzed: ljon shing sna tshogs me tog g-yur gyis dud //
translated: with various trees in full bloom,

original: dga' ba'i tshal na lta zhing dga' dang spyod //
analyzed: dga' ba'i tshal na lta zhing dga' dang spyod //
translated: where one could enjoy looking around and having fun.

original: bud med rnams ni glu dang rnga sgra snyan dang 'brel //
analyzed: bud med rnams ni glu dang rnga sgra snyan dang 'brel //
translated: The women were singing and playing sweet music,

original: 'dzin la mkhas pa'i yan lag mdzes par bsgyur ba'i gar //
analyzed: 'dzin la mkhas pa'i yan lag mdzes par bsgyur ba'i gar //
translated: and they were dancing with beautiful gestures, skilled in their performance.🔽The prince stayed there in that delightful pleasure grove,

analyzed: bud med bzang mo mdzes pa chas pa de dag dang // skyed mos tshal bzang de na de ni dga' bar gnas //

analyzed: de de na 'dug pa'i drung du bram ze legs par smra ba la mkhas pa zhig 'ongs te /
translated: While he was there, a skilled and eloquent brahmin came to see him.

original: zhes dang phyag byas nas de'i gzugs bzang po la sems chags bzhin du der 'dug go //
analyzed: zhes dang phyag byas nas de'i gzugs bzang po la sems chags bzhin du der 'dug go //
translated: He bowed to the prince and sat down, his mind attached to the prince's beautiful form.

original: de nas sems dpa' chen po de de na lang tsho la bab cing bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa'i mthu las byung ba'i rol mo byed pa rnams la lta zhing 'dug pa las bram ze 'ongs pas rab tu dga' bar ni gyur na /
analyzed: de nas sems dpa' chen po de de na lang tsho la bab cing bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa'i mthu las byung ba'i rol mo byed pa rnams la lta zhing 'dug pa las bram ze 'ongs pas rab tu dga' bar ni gyur na /

analyzed: su zhig de ni slad du 'ong ba yod //

original: 'chi bdag 'jigs pa thar bar dka' las thar //
analyzed: 'chi bdag 'jigs pa thar bar dka' las thar //
translated: Having escaped from the fear of the Lord of Death, which is difficult to escape,

original: rang gi khyim na bde bar gnas gyur pa //
analyzed: rang gi khyim na bde bar gnas gyur pa //
translated: and having lived happily in my own home,

original: gang phyir khyod ni nga yi drung 'ongs pa //
analyzed: gang phyir khyod ni nga yi drung 'ongs pa //
translated: for what reason have you come to me?

original: de yi rgyu ni ci zhig yod par smros //
analyzed: de yi rgyu ni ci zhig yod par smros //
translated: What is the reason for this?

original: byang chub sems dpas smras pa //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas smras pa //
translated: The Bodhisattva said:

original: bdag 'dir slar 'ong ba'i rgyu chen po cig yod par yang khyod kyis yid ches su mi rung ba ci yod /
analyzed: bdag 'dir slar 'ong ba'i rgyu chen po cig yod par yang khyod kyis yid ches su mi rung ba ci yod /
translated: “What reason do I have for not returning?

original: ngas slar 'ong ngo zhes khas ma blangs sam /
analyzed: ngas slar 'ong ngo zhes khas ma blangs sam /
translated: Did I not promise to return?

original: de ltar mi ngan pa dang mgo bsnyams te dogs pa ma bskyed cig / nga ni bu zla ba zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar mi ngan pa dang mgo bsnyams te dogs pa ma bskyed cig / nga ni bu zla ba zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: Do not be suspicious, thinking that I am a bad man. I am the son called Candra.

original: kha cig 'dod pa'i 'jigs pa 'am /
analyzed: kha cig 'dod pa'i 'jigs pa 'am /
translated: Some people, out of fear of desire,

original: shir dogs pas bden par smra ba rtsva dang 'dra bar dor /
analyzed: shir dogs pas bden par smra ba rtsva dang 'dra bar dor /
translated: or out of fear of death, throw away truth as if it were straw.

original: ya rabs rnams ni bden pa srog dang 'dra //
analyzed: ya rabs rnams ni bden pa srog dang 'dra //
translated: For the noble, truth is like their life;

original: de bas rab tu phangs kyang de ni 'dor //🔽bden pa med na tshe 'di'i bde ba'am //
analyzed: de bas rab tu phangs kyang de ni 'dor // bden pa med na tshe 'di'i bde ba'am //
translated: therefore, even if it is very difficult, they do not abandon it.🔽If there is no truth, one cannot protect oneself from the lower realms,

original: srog kyang ngan 'gro dag las bsrung mi nus //🔽dga' ba grags dang bde ba'i 'byung gnas gang //
analyzed: srog kyang ngan 'gro dag las bsrung mi nus // dga' ba grags dang bde ba'i 'byung gnas gang //
translated: even if one has the happiness of this life or even one’s life.

original: bde ba su zhig de phyir spong par byed //
analyzed: bde ba su zhig de phyir spong par byed //
translated: Who would give up truth, the source of joy, fame, and happiness?

original: gya gyu'i tshul zhig gal te mthong gyur tam //
analyzed: gya gyu'i tshul zhig gal te mthong gyur tam //
translated: If one sees a crooked way,

original: legs par spyod pa gal te ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: legs par spyod pa gal te ma mthong ngo //
translated: If I do not see you behave well,

original: de ltar bden pa yid ches mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: de ltar bden pa yid ches mi 'gyur ba //
translated: I will not believe the truth.

original: nga la ci zhig khyod mthong dogs pa skye //
analyzed: nga la ci zhig khyod mthong dogs pa skye //
translated: What is it that makes you fear to see me?

original: khyod kyis nga ni gal te 'jigs gyur tam //
analyzed: khyod kyis nga ni gal te 'jigs gyur tam //
translated: If I were afraid,

original: bde la chags pas snying rje med gyur na //🔽dpa' bar sems shing gtum por spyod grags pa //
analyzed: bde la chags pas snying rje med gyur na // dpa' bar sems shing gtum por spyod grags pa //
translated: or if I were heartless, greedy for pleasure,🔽would I come into your presence, sword in hand,

original: phub bzung mtshon bzung drung du nga 'ong ngam //
analyzed: phub bzung mtshon bzung drung du nga 'ong ngam //
translated: thinking myself brave, acting like a bully?

original: khyod dang bshes pa rang yang 'dod pa nyid //
analyzed: khyod dang bshes pa rang yang 'dod pa nyid //
translated: I myself want to be your friend.

original: 'di nas bram ze de yi don byas nas //
analyzed: 'di nas bram ze de yi don byas nas //
translated: Having done this favor for the brahmin,

original: slar yang bdag ni khyod kyi gan du 'ong //
analyzed: slar yang bdag ni khyod kyi gan du 'ong //
translated: I will return to you.

original: nged cag lta bu brdzun gyi tshig mi smra //
analyzed: nged cag lta bu brdzun gyi tshig mi smra //
translated: We do not speak false words.

original: de nas su d'a sa'i bus byang chub sems dpa'i tshig de rang la bstod pa 'dra bas ma bzod nas bsams pa //
analyzed: de nas su d'a sa'i bus byang chub sems dpa'i tshig de rang la bstod pa 'dra bas ma bzod nas bsams pa //
translated: Then the son of Sudāsa, unable to bear the bodhisattva’s words, which were like praise of himself, thought,

original: 'di ni bden par smras pa dang chos dang ldan par yang mngon na //
analyzed: 'di ni bden par smras pa dang chos dang ldan par yang mngon na //
translated: “He speaks the truth and seems to be righteous.

original: de bas na re zhig 'di bden pa la dga' ba dang chos la dga' ba la lta'o //
analyzed: de bas na re zhig 'di bden pa la dga' ba dang chos la dga' ba la lta'o //
translated: So let us see whether he is fond of the truth and of the Dharma.

original: gzhan yang 'di med du zin yang rgyal rigs kyi bu @121b brgya cam rang gi mthus rnyed pa bdag la yod kyis /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di med du zin yang rgyal rigs kyi bu @121b brgya cam rang gi mthus rnyed pa bdag la yod kyis /
translated: “ ‘Moreover, even if he does not exist, I am a son of the kṣatriyas, and I have wealth acquired by my own power.

original: ji ltar khas blang ba bzhin du de dag gis 'byung po'i mchod sbyin bya'o snyam nas /
analyzed: ji ltar khas blang ba bzhin du de dag gis 'byung po'i mchod sbyin bya'o snyam nas /
translated: So I will perform the sacrifice of living beings as I promised.

original: byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
translated: ’ He said to the bodhisattva,

original: 'on song shig khyod kyis bden par smra ba khas 'ches pa dang / chos dang ldan par khas 'ches par lta'o //
analyzed: 'on song shig khyod kyis bden par smra ba khas 'ches pa dang / chos dang ldan par khas 'ches par lta'o //
translated: ‘Well then, go! I see that you have promised to speak the truth and to act in accordance with the Dharma.

original: song la bram ze de ci dang ci 'dod pa byos la slar myur du shog cig / nga yang khyod bsreg pa'i sta gon byed cing sdod do //
analyzed: song la bram ze de ci dang ci 'dod pa byos la slar myur du shog cig / nga yang khyod bsreg pa'i sta gon byed cing sdod do //
translated: Go and do whatever that brahmin wants, and then come back quickly. I will be waiting to burn you.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpas de bzhin du bya'o zhes de'i tshig nyan nas rang gi khyim du song ngo //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpas de bzhin du bya'o zhes de'i tshig nyan nas rang gi khyim du song ngo //
translated: ’ “The bodhisattva agreed to do as he was told, and he went home.

original: rang gi mi rnams kyang rab tu dga' bar gyur to //
analyzed: rang gi mi rnams kyang rab tu dga' bar gyur to //
translated: His own people were overjoyed.

original: bram ze de yang bkug ste de las tshigs su bcad pa bzhi thos so //
analyzed: bram ze de yang bkug ste de las tshigs su bcad pa bzhi thos so //
translated: The brahman was summoned and the four verses were heard from him.

original: des de thos nas legs par smras pas yid mgu nas sems dpa' chen po des /
analyzed: des de thos nas legs par smras pas yid mgu nas sems dpa' chen po des /
translated: When he heard them, he was pleased with the good words, and the great man

original: bram ze de la mgu bar byas pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / bkur sti byas nas tshigs su bcad pa gcig gser srang stong stong gi thang du brtsis te /
analyzed: bram ze de la mgu bar byas pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / bkur sti byas nas tshigs su bcad pa gcig gser srang stong stong gi thang du brtsis te /
translated: honored the brahman, spoke pleasantly to him, and valued each verse at a thousand ounces of gold.

original: ci 'dod pa'i nor gyis mchod par byas so //
analyzed: ci 'dod pa'i nor gyis mchod par byas so //
translated: He worshiped him with wealth as desired.

original: de nas de'i phas de la gnas ma yin par god tshabs che ba dgag pa'i bsam pas skabs shig tu gleng bslang ste tshig 'jam pos smras pa /
analyzed: de nas de'i phas de la gnas ma yin par god tshabs che ba dgag pa'i bsam pas skabs shig tu gleng bslang ste tshig 'jam pos smras pa /
translated: Then his father, with the intention of stopping him from making a great loss in an improper place, at one time raised the subject and spoke with gentle words:

original: bu legs par smras pa la mchod pa yang ran par byas na //
analyzed: bu legs par smras pa la mchod pa yang ran par byas na //
translated: Son, you have also made an appropriate offering to the one who speaks well.

original: legs par shes par bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: legs par shes par bya bar rigs so //
translated: It is right to understand well.

original: khyod kyis 'bangs mang po gso dgos la /
analyzed: khyod kyis 'bangs mang po gso dgos la /
translated: You have to support many subjects,

original: rgyal po'i dpal yang nor phun sum tshogs pa la ltos so //
analyzed: rgyal po'i dpal yang nor phun sum tshogs pa la ltos so //
translated: and the king's glory also depends on abundant wealth.

original: de bas na khyod la smra'o //
analyzed: de bas na khyod la smra'o //
translated: Therefore, I tell you.

original: legs par smras pa'i mchod pa mngan brgya //
analyzed: legs par smras pa'i mchod pa mngan brgya //
translated: The offering of good speech is better still.

original: de bas mang na nus par mi 'gyur te ;
analyzed: de bas mang na nus par mi 'gyur te ;
translated: But if you offer more than that, you will not be able to do it.

original: / sbyin pa drags na nor gyi dbang phyug gi / nor yang ji srid cig tu thub par 'gyur //
analyzed: / sbyin pa drags na nor gyi dbang phyug gi / nor yang ji srid cig tu thub par 'gyur //
translated: If you give too much, how long will the wealth of the lord of wealth last?

original: nor dang rab tu ldan na bsgrub par nus //
analyzed: nor dang rab tu ldan na bsgrub par nus //
translated: If you are rich, you can practice.

original: de dang mi ldan na ni bsgrub mi nus //
analyzed: de dang mi ldan na ni bsgrub mi nus //
translated: If you are not rich, you cannot practice.

original: nor med na ni rgyal po'i dpal de yang //
analyzed: nor med na ni rgyal po'i dpal de yang //
translated: Even the glory of kingship, if you are not rich,

original: dga' bar mi 'gyur smad 'tshong bud med bzhin //
analyzed: dga' bar mi 'gyur smad 'tshong bud med bzhin //
translated: will not be enjoyable, like a prostitute’s woman.

original: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
translated: The bodhisattva said:

original: legs par smras pa rnams kyi ri thang cig / gal te nges par bcad du rung na ni //
analyzed: legs par smras pa rnams kyi ri thang cig / gal te nges par bcad du rung na ni //
translated: If it is right to decide on the value of good advice,

original: de yi rin du rgyal srid nyid kyang sbyin //
analyzed: de yi rin du rgyal srid nyid kyang sbyin //
translated: then I would give my kingdom as its price.

original: khyod kyis 'gyod kyang smra bar ga la 'gyur //
analyzed: khyod kyis 'gyod kyang smra bar ga la 'gyur //
translated: How could you regret it?

original: gang zhig thos nas yid ni dad gyur nas //
analyzed: gang zhig thos nas yid ni dad gyur nas //
translated: When someone hears it, their mind becomes faithful,

original: legs par dga' la brtan pa nyid @122a * //
analyzed: legs par dga' la brtan pa nyid @122a * //
translated: and they become happy, good, and steadfast.

original: du 'gyur // shes rab skye zhing gti mug med par 'gyur //
analyzed: du 'gyur // shes rab skye zhing gti mug med par 'gyur //
translated: Wisdom arises and delusion disappears.

original: rang gis shes kyang de nyid nyo bar rigs //
analyzed: rang gis shes kyang de nyid nyo bar rigs //
translated: Even if you know it yourself, it is right to buy it.

original: thos pa gti mug mun sel sgron me yin //
analyzed: thos pa gti mug mun sel sgron me yin //
translated: Hearing is the lamp that dispels the darkness of delusion,

original: rkun po la sogs mi khyer nor gyi mchog / kun tu rmongs pa'i dgra 'joms mtshon cha yin //
analyzed: rkun po la sogs mi khyer nor gyi mchog / kun tu rmongs pa'i dgra 'joms mtshon cha yin //
translated: The best of wealth that cannot be stolen by thieves and so forth, The weapon that conquers the enemy of complete delusion,

original: thabs tshul man ngag ston pa'i grogs kyi mchog / phongs par gyur kyang mi 'gyur mdza' bo yin //
analyzed: thabs tshul man ngag ston pa'i grogs kyi mchog / phongs par gyur kyang mi 'gyur mdza' bo yin //
translated: The best of friends who teach the methods and instructions, The friend who does not change even in times of hardship,

original: gnod pa med pa'i mya ngan nad kyi sman //
analyzed: gnod pa med pa'i mya ngan nad kyi sman //
translated: The medicine for the incurable illness of suffering,

original: nyes pa chen po yi ni dpung 'joms pa //
analyzed: nyes pa chen po yi ni dpung 'joms pa //
translated: The conqueror of the great army of faults,

original: grags dang dpal gyi gter gyi mchog kyang yin //
analyzed: grags dang dpal gyi gter gyi mchog kyang yin //
translated: The supreme treasure of fame and glory,

original: ya rabs rnams dang 'phrad na skyes kyi mchog /
analyzed: ya rabs rnams dang 'phrad na skyes kyi mchog /
translated: The best of gifts when meeting the righteous,

original: tshogs kyi nang na mkhas pa dga' bar 'gyur //🔽phas kyi rgol ba nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra //
analyzed: tshogs kyi nang na mkhas pa dga' bar 'gyur // phas kyi rgol ba nyi ma'i 'od dang 'dra //
translated: The delight of the wise in the assembly,🔽The sun's light for the opponent's arguments,

original: 'dren pa rnams kyang grags dang dregs pa sel //
analyzed: 'dren pa rnams kyang grags dang dregs pa sel //
translated: The dispeller of pride and fame for the guides,

original: mi shes rnams kyang rab tu dga' gyur nas //
analyzed: mi shes rnams kyang rab tu dga' gyur nas //
translated: The utter delight of the ignorant,

original: mig dang bzhin mdangs rab tu gsal gyur cing //
analyzed: mig dang bzhin mdangs rab tu gsal gyur cing //
translated: With eyes and facial expressions of utmost clarity,

original: lag pa'i se gol mgu byed rdeb pa yis //
analyzed: lag pa'i se gol mgu byed rdeb pa yis //
translated: And clapping their hands in joy,

original: khyad par rab tu che ba rnam par sgrogs /
analyzed: khyad par rab tu che ba rnam par sgrogs /
translated: And proclaim the most excellent distinctions.

original: gtan tshigs don rnams rab tu gsal bar ston //
analyzed: gtan tshigs don rnams rab tu gsal bar ston //
translated: The reasons are clearly shown.

original: gtsug lag lung rnams sna tshogs ston dang mtshungs //
analyzed: gtsug lag lung rnams sna tshogs ston dang mtshungs //
translated: It is like the various teachings of the scriptures.

original: bsnyen zhing sbyangs pas yid du 'ong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: bsnyen zhing sbyangs pas yid du 'ong ba'i phyir //
translated: Because of being pleasing through study and training,

original: me tog phreng ba mar rnying bkram pa bzhin //
analyzed: me tog phreng ba mar rnying bkram pa bzhin //
translated: It is like a flower garland spread with fresh butter.

original: dul zhing rab tu gsal ba'i spobs pa bskyed //
analyzed: dul zhing rab tu gsal ba'i spobs pa bskyed //
translated: It produces disciplined and clear confidence,

original: grags pa chen po 'phral du 'byung bar byed //
analyzed: grags pa chen po 'phral du 'byung bar byed //
translated: And immediately brings about great fame.

original: smra lce ba der 'gyur khyad par can gyi rgyu //
analyzed: smra lce ba der 'gyur khyad par can gyi rgyu //
translated: It is the cause of becoming a special eloquent speaker.

original: thos pa'i dpal goms don gsal rtogs par 'gyur //🔽thos dang ldan na 'gal ba med pa yi //
analyzed: thos pa'i dpal goms don gsal rtogs par 'gyur // thos dang ldan na 'gal ba med pa yi //
translated: By cultivating the glory of learning, the meaning becomes clear and realized.

original: 'khor gsum lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'khor gsum lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyur //
translated: When possessing learning, one abides on the path of the three spheres without contradiction.

original: thos pa'i rjes 'jug sgrub pa snying por byed //
analyzed: thos pa'i rjes 'jug sgrub pa snying por byed //
translated: Following learning, one makes practice the essence.

original: skye ba'i rdzong las tshegs chung thar bar 'gyur //
analyzed: skye ba'i rdzong las tshegs chung thar bar 'gyur //
translated: One is liberated from the fortress of birth with little difficulty.

original: de ltar thos pa yon tan du ma can //
analyzed: de ltar thos pa yon tan du ma can //
translated: Thus, learning has many good qualities.

original: thos pa bdag gis skyes dang 'dra rnyed nas //
analyzed: thos pa bdag gis skyes dang 'dra rnyed nas //
translated: Having obtained learning, which is like one's own birth,

original: nus bzhin du ni ji ltar mchod mi bgyi //
analyzed: nus bzhin du ni ji ltar mchod mi bgyi //
translated: How could I not worship you, when I am able?

original: khyod kyi bka' yang ci phyir bcag mi 'gyur //🔽skyon gyi lam du zhugs nas don med par //
analyzed: khyod kyi bka' yang ci phyir bcag mi 'gyur // skyon gyi lam du zhugs nas don med par //
translated: How could I not obey your command?🔽I have no need for the conduct of kingship,

original: yon tan nyams par 'gyur ba thob 'gyur ba'i //🔽rgyal srid spyod pa bdag la dgos pa med //
analyzed: yon tan nyams par 'gyur ba thob 'gyur ba'i // rgyal srid spyod pa bdag la dgos pa med //
translated: which leads to the path of faults, to the loss of virtue, and to meaninglessness.

original: de bas su d'a sa yi drung du 'gro //
analyzed: de bas su d'a sa yi drung du 'gro //
translated: Therefore, I will go to Sudāsa.

original: de nas de'i pha de de la byams pas rtab rtab por gyur nas /
analyzed: de nas de'i pha de de la byams pas rtab rtab por gyur nas /
translated: Then his father, out of love for him, became anxious.

original: zhes bskyed nas de la @122b smras pa /
analyzed: zhes bskyed nas de la @122b smras pa /
translated: Having generated that, he said to him:

original: bu khyod nyid la phan pa'i phyir ngas khyod la de skad smras kyis /
analyzed: bu khyod nyid la phan pa'i phyir ngas khyod la de skad smras kyis /
translated: “Son, I said that to you for your own benefit.

original: de ltar mi dga' ma byed cig khyod kyi dgra rnams su d'a sa'i bu'i dbang du 'gro 'am /
analyzed: de ltar mi dga' ma byed cig khyod kyi dgra rnams su d'a sa'i bu'i dbang du 'gro 'am /
translated: Do not be displeased. Will your enemies come under the power of Sudāsa’s son?

original: 'on te de'i drung du 'gro ba khyod kyis khas blangs te /
analyzed: 'on te de'i drung du 'gro ba khyod kyis khas blangs te /
translated: Or have you agreed to go to him,

original: bden pa bsrung ba'i phyir kha 'og tu lus 'khrud par bya 'dod na de yang ngas mi gnang ngo //
analyzed: bden pa bsrung ba'i phyir kha 'og tu lus 'khrud par bya 'dod na de yang ngas mi gnang ngo //
translated: and out of a desire to cleanse your body in his presence, in order to preserve your truthfulness, I will not allow that either.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rang gi srog bsrung ba dang bla ma'i don du brdzun byas kyang sdig tu mi 'gyur bar rig byed mkhas pa dag gis bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi srog bsrung ba dang bla ma'i don du brdzun byas kyang sdig tu mi 'gyur bar rig byed mkhas pa dag gis bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the experts on the Vedas explain that lying is not a sin when done to protect one’s life or for the sake of one’s guru.

original: de bas na brdzun spong ba la 'bad pas khyod la ci zhig bya /
analyzed: de bas na brdzun spong ba la 'bad pas khyod la ci zhig bya /
translated: So what is the point of striving to avoid lying?

original: srid dang 'dod pa nyid dang 'gal ba'i chos la brten pa yang thabs dang tshul ma yin la sdug bsngal yin par rgyal po thabs dang tshul ma mkhas par smra'o //
analyzed: srid dang 'dod pa nyid dang 'gal ba'i chos la brten pa yang thabs dang tshul ma yin la sdug bsngal yin par rgyal po thabs dang tshul ma mkhas par smra'o //
translated: “ ‘Moreover, relying on a Dharma that is contrary to worldly desires is a method and way that is painful. The king speaks without skill in means and methods.🔽Therefore, give up your bad time, which torments our minds and is not concerned with your own welfare.

original: de bas na nged kyi sems gdungs par 'gyur ba dang / rang gi don la yang mi lta bar khyod kyi ngan dus de thong shig / de ste gzhung lugs kyi chos dang 'gal bas gtam ngan pa dang yid dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar mi rigs so snyam nas khyod kyi yid la mi 'thad na yang khyod thar
analyzed: de bas na nged kyi sems gdungs par 'gyur ba dang / rang gi don la yang mi lta bar khyod kyi ngan dus de thong shig / de ste gzhung lugs kyi chos dang 'gal bas gtam ngan pa dang yid dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar mi rigs so snyam nas khyod kyi yid la mi 'thad na yang khyod thar
translated: If you think, “It is not right to contradict the Dharma of the scriptures and to contradict my promise,” and you are not satisfied with that, then, even though you are not satisfied, you must give up your bad time.

original: bar bya ba'i phyir nga'i dmag gi dpung rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / rkang thang du ldan pa'i snying nye ba /
analyzed: bar bya ba'i phyir nga'i dmag gi dpung rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta dang / rkang thang du ldan pa'i snying nye ba /
translated: I have already assembled a great army of my own, consisting of cavalry, elephants, chariots, and infantry, who are loyal,

original: dgra thabs la mkhas shing dpa' ba g-yul ngo du ma las rgyal bar gyur pa'i dpung chen po 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa bshams zin gyis /
analyzed: dgra thabs la mkhas shing dpa' ba g-yul ngo du ma las rgyal bar gyur pa'i dpung chen po 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa bshams zin gyis /
translated: skilled in warfare, and victorious in many battles.

original: de bas na des yongs su bskor te song la /
analyzed: de bas na des yongs su bskor te song la /
translated: Therefore, surrounded by them, go and🔽liberate him from the power of Yama,

original: de'i dbang du gyur pa las thar pa dang / gshin rje'i dbang du gyur pa las kyang thar bar byas nas /🔽khas blangs pa yang kha 'og tu lus 'khrud par 'gyur la /
analyzed: de'i dbang du gyur pa las thar pa dang / gshin rje'i dbang du gyur pa las kyang thar bar byas nas / khas blangs pa yang kha 'og tu lus 'khrud par 'gyur la /
translated: and bring him under my control.

original: bdag kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
